K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:454b-11: gang ma thang thang bdag cag 'di rna gnas nas rtsed mos rgyub rnams la ri dag byung bar gyur na rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:454b-12: rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rtse mo can 'od zer gyis snang bar byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:455a-0: bya'i tshogs kyi sgra rnam par brjod pas mngon @455a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:455a-2: ri phug dang khrod dang chu klung dang ngos dang ljongs dag gis dga' bar gyur pa'i sa gzhi cha shas rnams legs par rnam par phye ba thams cad nas rtsed mo rtse bar 'os pa lha bdag cag rnams la bdag cag lha rnams kyi yang lha bdag cag padma chen po'i bdab ma'i gseb tu zhugs pa rnams la de lta bu'i ri dag legs par byung bar gyur na rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:455a-3: de nas sems bskyed pa dang lhan cig kho nar lha de dag rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:455a-4: lha de dag gi legs par byas pa'i las kyi rkyen gyi dbang dang rkyen gyi dbang gis rab tu phal che bar gyur pa'i nags dang nye ba'i nags dang rdzing bu dang ri'i rtse mo dang khong gseng gi gseb dang dga' bar gyur pa'i ri ngos rnams dang tshang tshing dang phug dga' bar gyur pa rin po che bdun gyis rnam par sbras pas kun tu 'bar ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:455a-5: 'od zer dang ldan pas dga' bar byed pa de 'khri shing kun nas 'phyang ba dang sman ljongs dang ri khrod rnams yid kyi rjes su mthun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:455b-0: rtag tu mthong ba na dga' bar 'gyur ba'i ri brgya phrag rab tu byung bar gyur pa rnams la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang 'bras bu dang 'khri shing kun tu 'phyang bas legs par 'khril ba rnams kyis dga' bar gyur pa'i phug dang ngos dang ljongs rgya stong dang ldan @455b pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:455b-1: de nas lha de dag rnams 'dab ma'i gong bu de yongs su spangs nas de kho na bzhin du lha brgya stong gis yongs su bskor bas lha rdzas kyi mdog dang dri dang reg bya dang ldan pa rnams kyi rnying pa med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba rnams kyis nye bar khyab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:455b-2: lha'i klu mkhan gyi skad snyan pa rnams dang bcas pa'i dal zhing brgyud pas yid 'phrog pa'i sgra mdzes pa rnams kyis ring du yang rna ba'i bu ga tshim pa med par lha rdzas kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa'i ri de la dal bus dal bus 'grim par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:455b-3: thos phyi kun tu rgya bskyed nas mig legs par sgyur zhing lta bar byed pa'i mig snga na mngon par dga' ba rnams lha de dag rnams dga' bar byed cing g-yog gi bya ba rnams kyang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:455b-4: zas dang skom gyi klung rnams la'ang btung ba dang bza' ba dga' bar gyur pa dag la za ba dang 'thung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:455b-5: de rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i btung ba dang bza' ba'i bya ba rnams byas nas ri khrod kyi gseb rnams su manda'a ra ba dang padma ku she sha ya mchog gis rang gi lus la'ang bcings pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:455b-6: de bzhin du lha mo rnams kyis kyang lha rdzas kyi phreng ba mchog gis byas nas gar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456a-0: glu len pas kyang dus ring du lha rdzas nyid kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang bcas shing yang dag par ldan par gyur @456a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456a-1: pas; slar yang de kho na bzhin du yul rnams la chags pa'i yid kyis thams cad nyid du ngoms par ma gyur nas sred pa'i gtsang pos nges par khyer bar gyur pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456a-2: gzugs dang rgyan dang cha lugs sna tshogs pa can gyi lha de dag rnams lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas lan brgya phrag rnams su dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456a-4: phyir zhing yang mtsho chen po de nyid du rgyas pa'i mtsho chen po la padma chen pos legs par rgyas pa der nye bar 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456a-5: phyir zhing yang mtsho chen po de nyid du kun nas nye bar 'jug par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456a-6: kun tu nye bar bgrod par yang byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456a-7: slar yang de kho na bzhin du de kho na nyid kyi padma'i 'dab ma rnams la de bzhin nyid du so so so sor ches dga' bar gyur pa'i rtsed mo rnams nyams su myong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456a-8: rang gi las rnams dang cha 'dra ba rgyas btab pa'i rjes 'dod pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456a-9: de nas gzhan yang lha de dag rnams nyid 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456a-10: tha mar yang bdag cag rnams kyi ri sul sna tshogs pa rnams nas rnam pa du ma rnams pa sna tshogs pa'i bya gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456a-16: spyod lam rnams mthong na dga' ba snyan par gyur ba'i sgra du ma rnams kyis rtse sgrog pas lhag par dga' bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456b-0: @456b rin po che bdun gyi thig les rnam par spras pa'i rin po che bdun rnam par bkra ba'i thig le rnams skyes pa'i lus rgya chen po thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i 'gros kyis legs par spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456b-1: chu dang thang dang bar snang rnams la'ang bde ba'i 'gros kyis 'gro bar byed pa gang dag gis bdag cag rnams nus par gyur pa blta na sdug pa'i bya de dag rnams byung na rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456b-2: nged rang rnams kyis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil du 'gro bar ni nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456b-3: 'on kyang bdag cag rnams 'dod pa na tha mar yang bdag cag bya de dag rnams kyi rgyab tu zhon la lha mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas shin tu bde bas nam mkha'i dkyil du rab tu bgrod pas bde ba rgya chen pos sa ma lus pa 'di dag rnams kun nas gnod pa med pa'i 'gros kyis kun tu blta bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456b-4: nye 'khor kun la rnam par bltas shing rnam par bltas nas slar nyid kyang ches lhag par lhan cig spyod pa'i 'khor dang bcas nas rtsed mo byed par gyur pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456b-6: rnams kyi sems bskyed pa dang lhan cig kho nar sna tshogs pa'i ri'i khrod dang phug dang 'khri shing 'phyang pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456b-8: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshang tshing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:456b-10: ljon shing rnams la gnas pa'i bya rnams legs pa'i las kyis bos par gyur pa na 'ong bar 'gyur ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457a-1: dang cha byad dang sna tshogs pa'i mdog dang skad kyi dbyangs rnams dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457a-2: rin po che bdun gyi thig le rnams kyis spras pas rnam par bkra ba; lha mo rnams thams cad kyang ngo mtshar ba skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457a-3: yid mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457a-4: nam mkha'i dkyil ma lus pa de dag rnams kun nas khyab par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457a-5: rtse sgrog pas kyang gang bar byas nas padma chen po'i 'dab ma'i gong bu rnams gang na lha de dag rnams rtse ba der kun kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457a-7: nam mkha' la 'gro ba yin pas nam mkha' ma lus pa rnams thams cad du khyab par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457a-8: de nas lha de dag gis bya de dag mngon par mthong nas lha mo dang bcas pa rnams slar nyid kyang ches rab tu rangs par gyur pa'i yid kyis lhan cig spyod pa dang bcas pa rnams nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags par 'dod par gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457a-9: de nas bya de dag rnams gang gi tshe nye bar 'ongs pa de'i tshe lhan cig spyod pa rnams dang bcas pa de dag nyid kyi rgyab tu nges par zhon te nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu 'phags par gyur nas nye 'khor du'ang de dag gis khyab par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457a-10: de nas glu len par gyur bas lag na pi wang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457a-11: gser gyi dbu po rgyud mang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-0: lha rdzas kyi rol mo @457b mkhan dga' bar gyur pa rnams kyis rna ba'i bu gar gtad par gyur pa phan tshun lhan cig tu bde ba'i sa de dag rnams la kun tu lta bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-1: dga' ba rnams la nye bar longs spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-2: lha de dag rnams bde ba'i 'dod chags kyis chags par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-3: dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyis rab tu rnam par nyams pa'i yid can rnams kyis pha rol tu'ang log par ltung bar gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-5: de nas de'i dus na legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis legs par bskul bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-6: de kho na nyid brjod pa zhes bya ba'i byas lha bag med pa de dag rnams la rjes su 'doms par byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bshad pa ji ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-7: ji ltar lus can rnams kyi ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-8: srog ni shin tu myur 'gro ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-9: bya rnams 'gros dang rlung po yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-10: de bzhin myur du 'gro ba min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-11: rlung de las ni phyir bzlog cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-12: bya de rnams kyang phyir la zlog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-14: de ni slar yang 'ongs pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-15: las ni myur bar zad pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-16: tha ma yang ni myur bar 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-18: lha rnams kyis kyang go ba min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-19: zlog par mi nus shugs chen po; ;gtum po thams cad brlag par nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-20: nges par myong ba'i stobs ldan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:457b-22: shin tu bag med pa yi lha //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-0: bde bas yongs su bslus pa @458a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-1: yin; ;gang zhig nges par 'byung ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-2: sdug bsngal chen po ma rig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-3: 'dus byas kyang ni thams cad kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-4: 'jigs dang bcas pa'i khyad par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-6: srid nas srid par chos nyid kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-8: srog na 'chi ba'i tha ma ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-9: rgud par gyur pa'i 'jigs byed kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-10: gnas pa rnams ni 'jig pa'i rgyu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-11: 'jigs chen rnam pa de lta bu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-12: sdug bsngal gyis kyang 'jigs pa che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-13: bag med pa yi lha yang gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-14: bsam pa de dag cung zad med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-15: gang yang blo yi mig gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-17: de ni mkhas pa yin zhes bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-18: byis pa rnams ni ldog pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-19: rnam rmongs yid can thams cad ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-20: rang gi sems ni bslus pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-21: mar me'i snyam ni zad lta bu'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-22: las zad pa ni ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-23: dga' ba'i yul ni du ma rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-24: bde ba bla na med pa 'di; ;longs spyod nas ni las zad pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-25: slar yang log par ltung bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-26: de ltar bya des legs par byas pa'i las kyi tshig gis lha de dag rnams la rjes su ston par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458a-27: bag med pa'i yul gyis kun nas rmongs pa'i lha de dag rnams kyis go bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458b-0: brjod pa de dag rnams la'ang rtsis btab ma byas par @458b phyir nyid kyang bde ba rgya chen po'i sa gzhi ma lus pa de dag rnams kun tu lta bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458b-1: thams cad las mngon par dga' bar gyur pa'i ri rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458b-8: nye ba'i nags dang legs par 'brel pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458b-9: de lta de ltar padma'i tshal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458b-10: ri bo'i mchog rnams kyis yongs su gang ba rnams na lha'i tshogs rtse dga' ba rnams kyis legs par 'brel pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458b-11: yang gzhan rnams la bya rnams kyis brjod pa'i khyad par dga' bar 'gyur ba rab tu glu blangs pa lta bur thams cad nas rna bas dang du len par byed pa'i sgra rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458b-12: gzhan yang de ma yin pa rnams mthong bar gyur pa la lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su ba skor nas padma'i bar mtshams rnams nas rin po che'i rtsi dag 'thung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458b-13: dpag bsam gyi shing gi nags rnams la'ang rnga skad yan lag lnga dang ldan pas lhan cig tu dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458b-14: gzhan yang gzhan dag rnams su rgyu bar gyur pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:458b-15: khang bu nam mkha'i dkyil dang 'dra ba rnams la zhon pa'i lha dang lha mo rnams lhan cig tu lha rdzas kyi me tog gi phreng ba'i rgyan dang lha rdzas kyi yul lnga po rnams nyid lha rdzas kyi rnga rnams nyid kyis rtse bar gyur pa rnams mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459a-0: lha dang lha mo de dag rnams nyid kyis @459a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459a-1: kyang mthong nas phan tshun lhan cig tu tshogs par gyur te rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459a-2: rin po che bdun dang rin po che ma ra ka ta yis rnam par bkra zhing 'tsher bag dang ldan par nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'ongs pa'i bya de dag rnams kyi rgyab tu legs par zhon pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459a-3: lha gzhan gang dag dga' ba'i tshal na kun tu gnas pa de dag rnams khang bu'i steng du legs par zhon pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459a-4: de dag thams cad dang yang dag par ldan par gyur nas nam mkha'i nyid la rtse dga' bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459a-5: phan tshun du grogs kyi bya ba dang ldan pas dga' bar yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459a-6: dus shin tu ring bar 'dod pa'i mchog rnams la de dag rnams kyis lhan cig tu rtse dga' bar byas nas slar yang ri'i rtse mo dag la 'khod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459a-7: nags dang nye ba'i nags rnams la de dag rnams kyis rnam pa sna tshogs ba'i rtsed 'jo rnams byas nas slar yang rnam par rgyas pa'i mtsho chen po der 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459a-8: bya de dag rnams nyid kyi rgyab tu legs par zhon nas nam mkha' bzhin du khyab par byas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459a-9: lha rdzas kyi rol mo rnams la chags par gyur pa'i yid kyis nags dang nye ba'i nags rnams las slar yang rnam par rgyas pa'i mtsho chen po de nyid du legs par 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459b-0: gzhan yang rnam @459b par rgyas pa'i mtsho de nyid thams cad las dga' bar gyur par go nas gzhan yang de dag rnams bya de dag gis rgyab dag las mu tig gi stan rnams la legs par babs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459b-1: de nas yang thams cad dang ldan par gyur pa rnams phyir zhing nyid du de dag rnams padma'i 'dab mal rab tu 'dug nas dga' bar byed pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459b-3: de nas padma'i 'dab ma de la dus ring du dga' bar gyur nas dus gzhan na 'di lta bu'i blo skyes par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459b-4: gang bdag cag rnams 'di kho na ltar gnas bzhin du ma thang yang 'khri shing gi khang bu rnams la rgyags pa'i khu byug gi sgra dga' bar gyur pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459b-5: me tog gi char kun tu 'phyang ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459b-6: rin po che sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra ba ches rab tu phal che ba sna tshogs pa'i lo ma dang 'dab ma chags par 'gyur ba rnams dang yang dag par ldan pas nye bar bkod pa'i 'khri shing gi khang bu dag bdag cag rnams kyi rtsed mo'i don du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur mod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459b-7: de nas sems bskyed pa dang lhan cig nyid du lha de dag rnams kyi legs par byas pa'i las kyis de dag gi 'khri shing gi khang bu rnams rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 'od dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459b-8: me tog gi mchog gis kun tu spung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:459b-9: gser bzang po'i rang bzhin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460a-0: @460a *// sngon po chen po'i rang bzhin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460a-1: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460a-2: de bzhin du shel gyi rang bzhin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460a-3: de bzhin du gser btso ma'i rang bzhin gyi mchog tu mthong nas dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460a-4: de bzhin du rnam par 'dres pa po'i rnam par bkra ba'i 'khri shing gi khang ba de rang 'byung bar 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460a-5: legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis dus mi ring ba nyid na 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460a-6: de nas lha de dag rnams kyis 'khri shing gi khang pa de dag mngon par kun nas legs par mthong bas mchog tu rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis slar yang de kho na bzhin du rtse bar byed cing dga' bar yang byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460a-7: lha mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas nas lha rdzas kyi phreng bas brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460a-8: 'dod pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460a-9: gnod pa med pa dang ldan pa'i yid kyis phrag dog dang ser sna dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460a-10: 'thab mo dang yid mi bde ba'i skyon rnams dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460a-11: bde legs su rnam par rgyu ba legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis de dag rnams la dga' bar byed pa'i rnga skad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa rnams la mnyam pa dang snyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460a-12: dal zhing rgyun chags pa'i dbyangs kyis rgyan du byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-0: 'khri shing gi khang bu de dag rnams su lhan cig spyod pa @460b de dag nyid dang ngoms pa med pa'i yid kyis lhan cig tu dga' bar byed pa rnams thams cad kyang sred pa'i dug gis bsregs par gyur pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mtshungs pa med pa rnams kyis rnam par ngoms pa med par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-1: mi rtag pa dang cha 'dra ba'i dpe med pa'i 'khri shing gi khang par dga' bar gyur pas ches lhag par chags pas bsgos par gyur pa'i dga' ba rnams nyams su myod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-2: 'khri shing gi khang pa de dag kun yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'khri shing 'phyang bas dga' bar gyur pa rnams la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-3: bee d'urya'i rang bzhin gyi 'khri shing rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-5: padma r'a ga dang mtshungs pa'i mdog gi 'bras bu rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-6: aindra n'i la'i 'khri shing rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-7: dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi kha dog gi 'dab ma rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-8: shel dang kha dog mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-9: gser gyi 'khri shing rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-10: aindra n'i la dang mdog mtshungs pa'i lo ma rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-11: padma r'a ga dang mdog mnyam pa'i 'bras bu rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-12: rin po che bdun rnam par 'dres pa'i 'khri shing rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-13: 'dab ma dang 'bras bu rnams kyang rnam par 'dres pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-14: gser gyi 'khri shing rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-15: dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi 'dab ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-16: dngul gyi kha dog gi 'bras bu rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:460b-17: rnam pa de srid kyi 'dab ma rnams nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461a-1: mtshungs pa'i kha dog rnams la de dang mtshungs pa'i 'dab ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461a-3: de ltar lha de dag rnams kyi 'khri shing gi khang bu rnams de dag rnams kyi legs par byas pa'i las kyis sems bskyed pa dang lhan cig nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461a-4: de nas lha de dag rab tu dga' ba'i bde bas 'khri shing gi khang bu de dag tu legs par zhugs nas lha mo rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461a-5: dga' bar yang byed cing g-yog gi bya ba rnams kyang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461a-6: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lha yul gyi bde ba rnams kyis myos shing ngoms pa'ang med la bde ba'i tshul nya bzhin du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461a-7: de de ltar lha de dag rnams nyid kyang shin tu ngo mtshar bskyed par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i 'khri shing gi rnam par 'phyang bas kun nas g-yogs pa rnams su legs par zhugs nas dga' bar byed cing glu'ang len par byed la rnga skad yan lag lnga pas de ltar yang dga' bar gyur pa na 'di ltar sems par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461a-8: ji ltar chung ngu na 'khri shing gi khang bu 'di nyid du rab tu bde bar zhugs pa'i bdag cag 'di dag rnams nyid la rab tu mchog gi mdog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461a-11: bde ba'i reg bya phun sum tshogs pa'i chu klung gang zhig 'dab ma'i gseb dag nas bab par gyur na ci ma rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461b-0: zhu gsol byed pa'i lhan cig @461b dus su spyod pa dang bcas pa rnams phyir zhing ches lhag pa nyid du zhu bar bya ba'i don du de bzhin du sems par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461b-1: de dag rnams sems bskyed pa tsam nyid na chu klung de dag ro dang dri dang reg bya rab kyi mchog dang ldan par yang legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis byung bar gyur pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461b-2: 'dab ma'i gseb dag nas rgyun 'bab par gyur pas rab tu rdol bar gyur pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461b-3: de de ltar lhan cig rjes su spyod pa rnams dang bcas pa rmad du gyur pas rgyags shing myos nas 'dod pa'i sred pa rnams kyis rnam par ngoms pa med pas dus yun ring du glu len pa'i rgyags pas rgyags pa'i sems kyis dga' bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461b-5: bag med pa'i sa rnams skyes par gyur pa de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461b-6: rang bzhin gyis legs par byas pa'i las rnams zad par byed pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461b-9: yul gyi sred pa rnams kyis ngoms pa med par de ltar rtse rab tu 'jo bar byed pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:461b-11: gang chung du na bdag cag rnams la dri dang ro dang mdog dang reg bya rab kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi dag 'dab ma'i gseb rnams nas bar du gzugs par gyur mod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462a-0: de nas lha de dag rnams kyi legs par byas pa'i las dag gis sems bskyed pa tsam nyid kyis ro dang mdog dang dri dang reg bya mchog gi rab @462a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462a-1: tu gyur pa'i bdud rtsi de dag ji ltar las dang 'khos 'dra zhing rjes su mthun pa rnams rab tu bab par gyur pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462a-2: de ltar de dag rnams nyid dus yun ring por mid par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462a-3: de nas lha de dag rnams 'di ltar yang sems par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462a-4: gang mthong yang bdag cag rnams la do shal dang cod pan nor bus spras pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462a-5: dpung rgyan dang me tog gi phreng ba dang lha rdzas rnams ji ltar mtho ris kyi rjes su mthun pa ches lhag par dga' bar gyur pa rnams 'khri shing gi gseb dag nas rnyed na ci ma rung snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462a-6: de ltar lha de dag rnams kyi sems bskyed pa dang dus gcig nyid du legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis mtho ris kyi rjes su mthun par dga' bar gyur pa'i rgyan de dag rnams rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462a-7: de nas lha de dag rgyan de dag rnams kyis rgyan du byas nas 'dod pa'i bde ba rnams kyis dus ring du'ang ngoms pa med par lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pas dus ring por dga' bar byas kyang yul gyi sred pa rnams kyis rnam par ngoms pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462a-9: de dag de ltar rnam par gnas pa rnams 'di ltar sems par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462b-0: gang chung du na ral mo mkhan rnams las kyang lhag pa'i dbyangs gzhan du gyur pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi dri rnams dang yang dag par @462b ldan pa'i yon tan de lta bu dang ldan par 'dab ma rlung gis bskyod par byed na rung ngo snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462b-1: de nas lha de dag rnams kyi legs par byas pa'i las dag gis sems bskyed pa tsam nyid na rnam pa de tsam nyid kyi rlung rnams kyi khams legs pa dal bus 'byung ba rtsom ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462b-2: gang gis de dag rnams la rab tu bskyed cing phan tshun du dkrol bas byas pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i dbyangs 'di dag rab tu 'byung ba'i khyad par gang gis glu mkhan gyi glu de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462b-3: bcu drug char yang chog pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462b-4: de nas lha de dag rnams lha mo de dag dang stabs cig tu dus yun ring por dga' bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462b-6: glu len pa dang rgod par yang byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462b-8: ngoms par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462b-10: gzhan yang 'di snyam du sems par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462b-11: gang chung du na'ang bdag cag rnam par gnas pa rnams nyid la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i kha dog can rin chen sna bdun gyis rnam par spras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462b-12: 'dod pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'i khang bu dag rab tu byung bar gyur na rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462b-13: gang gis slar yang bdag cag rnams mtsho chen po 'di'i nye 'khor rnams su yongs su bskor nas nam mkha' la gnas pas de ltar rtsed 'jo dag byed par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:462b-14: bdag cag rnams yongs su spyod par yang bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463a-3: glu len par gyur par yang ngo snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463a-4: de ltar de dag gi sems bskyed pa tsam nyid dang lha rnams kyi drung du khang bu dag rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams la rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin las rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i cha shas rnams kyis rnam par bkra bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463a-5: mu tig gi phreng ba dang bcas pa lan kan dga' bar gyur pa rnams ches mchog tu mthong na dga' bar gyur pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463a-11: rnam par bkra ba'i bya rnams thams cad kyis 'dren pa yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463a-12: lha de dag rnams kyi mdun nyid na ji ltar 'dod pa'i bzhon pa de dag rnams yin par de dag legs par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463a-13: de dag rnams mthong bar gyur nas gzhan yang lha de dag kho na bzhin du mnyam por zhon par gyur nas de kho na bzhin du 'gying bar yang gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463a-14: rtse bar gyur pas kyang de dag thams cad gang na rnam par rgyas pas mtsho yod pa der legs par 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463a-15: de dag rnams kyis mtsho de mtha' dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463a-16: padma chen po de'ang mthong bar gyur nas de dag rnams rgyu bar byed pa na padma chen po de ma lus pa mthong na shin tu ngo mtshar bar gyur pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463b-0: de'ang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po @463b che'i rang bzhin gyi 'dab ma rnams rnam par bkra ba'i 'od zer 'phro bar gyur pas rnam par gsal bar byas pa de'i kha dog sna tshogs pa rnams la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463b-1: rdo rje dang aindra n'i la dang mar ka ta dang padma r'a ga dang bee d'urya dang sngon po chen po dang dngul dang gser dang mtshungs pa'i kha dog rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463b-2: de dag rnams kyi 'od kyis kun nas gsal bar byed pa dang 'dab ma rnams mtshungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463b-3: mchog tu blta na sdug par gyur pa dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463b-4: nam mkha'i dkyil na khang bu rnams la legs par gnas pa'i lha de dag rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463b-5: padma'i 'dab ma de dag la lha gzhan dag lhan cig spyod pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa gnas pa rnams rtse bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463b-6: phan tshun grogs su gyur pas myos pa la don gcig pa rnams mtsho de'i padma'i 'dab ma rnams kyi gseb tu song nas glu len pa dang gar yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463b-7: de nas nam mkha'i dkyil na rgyu bar byed pa'i lha de dag rnams dang gang yang padma chen po'i 'dab ma'i nang na gnas pa de dag dang de dag rnams thams cad kyang rnam pa du mar rtse dga' ba chen po nyid kyis rnam par rgyu zhing rtsed 'jos rnam par rgyu bar byed pa gang yin pa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463b-8: dpe rnams kyis nye bar bya bar sla ba'ang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463b-9: de dag rnams de ltar rtse bar gyur pa'i glu dang rol mo'i sgra dbyangs rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:463b-10: dpag tshad lnga brgyar rnam par gnas par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464a-1: phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'i rnga skad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i chen po rnams rnam pa du mar nye bar longs spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464a-3: rang gi las kyi khyad par gang yin pa rnams spyad cing byas la yongs su bsags pa de skyel bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464a-4: 'on kyang dran par 'gyur ba'ang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464a-5: ji ltar na las rnams zad par 'gyur ba yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464a-6: legs par byas pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464a-7: gtugs par 'gyur ba yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464a-8: 'chi 'pho ba'i dus na gang du 'gro bar bya dgos pa yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464a-9: 'gro ba gang rjes su sgrub pa 'byung ba yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464a-10: rnam pa ji lta bu'i bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnams la nye bar longs spyod par bya ba 'byung ba dang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464a-12: legs par byas pa dang nye bar byas pa'i las rnams kyi lam legs par ston pa po dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464a-15: mi'i gnas rnams su 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang 'jigs pa med par sgrub pa'i 'jigs pa med pa'i dbang du byas nas skye ba gzhan gyi gnas rnams la de ltar kun tu go ba ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464a-16: mun par byed pa'i bag med par nub par gyur pa de'i tshe go ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464b-0: gang gi tshe legs par byas pa'i las rnams yongs su zad par gyur nas mi rtag pa nyid kyi rlung gis nges par ltung bar byed pa de'i tshe bag med @464b pa de bsten cing bsgoms la lan mang du byas par gyur pa rnams grogs po ma yin pa grogs po'i gzugs can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464b-1: phan pa ma yin pa phan pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa rnams kyis rim pa phyin ci log tu byed pa'i 'bras bu nye bar rig par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464b-2: gang bdag cag gis bag med pa rnams kun nas bsten cing bsgoms la lan mang du byas pa gang yin pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464b-3: legs par bsgrubs pa'ang ma yin par de ltar 'bras bu rnams shes par 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464b-4: bag med pa'i dgra bos ji ltar byas pa de dag rnams la rtsis bgrang med par lha de dag rnams phyir zhing nyid kyang dga' bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464b-6: mtsho de'ang legs par byas pa'i las rnams thams cad kyi snying po dang 'dra bar ches dga' bar gyur par padma'i rgyal po'i 'dab ma rnams la rtse dga' bar byed pa de dag rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464b-7: gang yang nam mkha'i dkyil na khang bu rnams kyis 'gro ba dag gi mtsho de mtshungs par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464b-8: de nas de ltar bag med pa rnams la chu'i rlabs la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i byas lha de dag rnams kyi legs par byas pa'i las kyi tshigs su bcad pa rjod par byed pa rnams la ji ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464b-9: lus can rnams kyi gson pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464b-10: chu yi rlabs ltar g-yo ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464b-11: snying po med pa'i chu'i chu bur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464b-12: lha rnams kyis ni go ba'ang min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464b-13: dbu ba'i phung po ring gnas kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:464b-14: tshe 'di yang ni mdor sdud pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-0: lha yi yun ring gnas min @465a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-1: te; ;mi rtag pa yis skal ba sdangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-2: ji ltar mar me rnam zhig pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-4: de bzhin las ni rnam zad pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-5: lha rnams kyi ni bde ba 'jig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-6: byas pa'i las gang mi 'jig pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-7: cung zad yod pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-8: de ltar na yang rmongs pa'i rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-9: skye 'di rnams ni rtag nyid min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-10: dngos gang 'ga' zhig skye ba ni; ;de yi 'jig pa rtag par gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-11: 'dus byas kyang ni thams cad kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-12: chos nyid 'dir ni rnam par gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-13: gal te 'khor ba'i srog chags rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-14: rang gi las kyis 'khor byed na; ;'jig rten 'di ci'i don du rmongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-15: bag med pas ni rnam par bcom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-16: bag med pas ni bde legs 'joms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-17: bag med pas ni 'ching ba'i mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-18: bag med log par ltung ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-19: bag med pas ni dmyal bar 'tshed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-20: sdug bsngal 'di yi rgyu gcig pu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-21: bag med yin par yongs su bsgrags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-22: de phyir bde don gnyer skyes bus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-23: bag med yongs su spang bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-24: gang gis bag med yongs spangs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-26: gang yang bag yod la dga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-27: de ni mya ngan 'das mtha' nyid; ;bag yod go 'phang de dag kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-29: bag med log par ltung ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-30: rgyu de dag tu rab tu bsgrags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465a-31: skyes bu bag med thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-0: @465b de ni smyon pa bzhin du snang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-2: phyi ma la ni sdig pas 'tshed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-3: bag med pa yi skyes bu kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-4: phyin ci log la 'jug par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-5: rgyu rnams las kyi rnam smin dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-7: bag med me ni gdug pa 'dis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-8: dmyal bar rjes su 'khrid par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-9: de phyir dmyal las grol don du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-10: bag med rnam par spang par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-11: gang gis bag med des rnam rgyal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-12: rtag tu shes rab la dga'i mi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-13: de ni nyon mongs 'ching bcad nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-15: sgo lnga nas ni dri ma gsum //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-16: skye bas khams gsum rtag 'jug pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-17: bag med las ni rnam rgyal ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-18: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bag med gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-19: bag med mun pa'i skye gnas yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-20: bag yod pa ni bde ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-21: de phyir bde don gnyer skyes bus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-22: bag med rnam par spang bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-23: de ltar chu'i rlabs la rtsed mo rtse ba zhes bya ba'i byas lha bag med par gyur pa de dag rnams kyi bag med pa kun tu zhi bar bya ba'i don du rjes su ston pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-24: lha de dag rnams kyang kun tu rmongs par gyur pa'i phyir na ji ltar de kho na nyid de dag rnams brjod par gyur pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-25: de ltar kun tu mi rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:465b-26: slar yang de kho na bzhin du gang dag nam mkha'i dkyil du song ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466a-1: rgyas pa'i padma'i 'dab ma rnams la lta ba gang yin pa de dag rnams phan tshun kun tu lta ba la ched cher byed pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466a-2: rtse 'jo bar byed cing dga' bar yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466a-3: mchog tu snyan par gyur pa'i lha rdzas kyi rnga skad yan lag lnga pa rnams kyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466a-4: yul gzhan rnams kyi gzugs dang dris kyang phan tshun du yid 'phrog par gyur pa'i bde ba rnams kyis kyang rnam par ngoms pa med pa'i yul rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466a-5: lan tsha'i chu bzhin du lan gcig ma yin pa dang lan gcig ma yin par yang nags rnams nyid du rnam par ngoms pa med par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466a-6: lha de dag rnams de kho na bzhin du rnam pa du mar dga' bar byed cing bde ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466a-7: de nas dus shin tu ring bar lha de dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil du rtsed sgrog dag byas nas slar yang gang na rnam par rgyas pa'i mtsho de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466a-8: padma chen po'i nags yod pa der legs par 'bab par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466a-9: lha gang yang padma chen po de'i 'dab ma rnams la lhan cig rjes su spyod pa dang bcas nas rnga skad yan lag lnga dang ldan pas glu len par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466a-11: kun tu g-yog byed pa de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466b-0: phan tshun du g-yog gi bya bas bgrod cing mthun par 'jug pas rgyags pa la don gcig pa 'dod pa drug la @466b rnam par chags pa'i yid kyis du sa ring du glu len par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466b-1: mchog tu rtsed mo rtse bar yang byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466b-2: de dag rnams rnam pa du ma dang rnam par rtog pa du mas bde ba rnams nyams su myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466b-3: de dag gi bde ba de dag rnams kyang sems bskyed pa dang lhan cig tu skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466b-4: kun tu rtog pa tsam gyis rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466b-5: dge ba'i las rnams kyis de ltar yang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466b-6: lha de dag de ltar kun tu rtog pa'i chu'i shugs la rnam par rtog pa'i rlabs kyi phreng ba dang ldan pa'i chu klung chen pos kun tu khyer bar gyur pa de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466b-7: mchog tu bag med pa'i yid kyis dus ring du 'da' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466b-8: mtsho chen po de'i padma'i 'dab ma rnams la song ba'i lha rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466b-9: lha rdzas kyi bde ba rnam pa du ma rnams dang rnam par 'dres pa du ma rnams nyams su myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466b-10: de dag de ltar rnam par 'phyan pas bag med par spyod pa de dag rnams la rjes su ba rtse ba'i don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466b-11: bag med pa kun tu spang par bya ba'i don du 'ang 'thab bral gyi bdag po mu su lundha des des sprul pa 'di dag rnams byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466b-12: gzugs dang lang tsho'i rgyags pa rnams kun tu zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:466b-13: bya ba'i don du'ang yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467a-0: de bzhin du'ang mtsho chen po rnam par rgyas pa de'i drung de na grib ma sngon po zhes bya ba'i ri thams cad nas @467a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467a-1: kyang shin tu rab tu dang pa'i bee d'urya'i rang bzhin la gser dang dngul gyi khams kyi 'byung khungs rnams dang ldan pa thams cad du bkra zhing bkra bar gyur pa'i nags 'bar ba'i phreng ba rnams dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467a-2: 'bab chu stong phrag brgya gser shin tu bsil ba dang rin po che'i 'od kyis kun tu snang bar gyur pa'i rtse mo thams cad la'ang ljon shing gi tshal dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467a-3: padma'i rdzing bu rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467a-4: me tog gi 'byung gnas rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467a-5: 'khri shing gi khang pa stong gis rnam par brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467a-6: nye 'khor rnam pa de ltar bur rnam par mdzes pa'i ri'i mchog de la 'thab bral ba'i mnga' bdag des bde ba rgya chen po'i sa na gnas pa'i lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467a-7: lha gzhan rnams la'ang phan par bya ba'i don du rdzu 'phrul byas pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467a-8: lha rdzas kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo bo'i sprul pa rnams yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467b-0: bde ba rgya chen po'i sa la gnas pa'i lha de dag rnams las thabs thams cad nas bcu 'gyur gyis gzugs dang lang tsho dang mdangs dang mgyogs pa dang spro ba dang gar dang glu dang rgod pa dang 'gying bag dang rtsed 'ji la sbro ba la sogs pa rnams kyis ches lhag pa'i lha rdzas kyi yul gyi rnam pa de srid pa rnams sbrul pa gang yin @467b pa 'di dag gi khyad par gyis lha gzhan de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467b-1: bcur byas pa'i cha tsam du'ang 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467b-2: rim pa thams cad kyis gzugs dang lang tsho dang chad dang mdog dang dbyibs dang rgod pa dang 'gying bag dang glu dang gar dang rtsed mo'i yang rim pa rnams kyi rim pa rnams thams cad kyis kyang cung zad mdzes pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467b-3: rnam pa de srid du sprul pa de dag rnams phal cher ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467b-4: grib ma sngon po'i ri de la ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467b-5: nye 'khor kun nas bee d'urya'i rang bzhin yin pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467b-7: de nas ri'i mchog gang yin pa de'i rtse mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467b-8: thams cad mchog tu gyur pa de dag rnams las sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467b-9: lha mo dag kyang glu len par gyur pas yan lag lnga dang ldan par gyur pa'i rol mo rnams kyang mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467b-11: snyan par gyur pa rnams byed cing gang na rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams gar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467b-12: 'gying bar byed pas skyed mos tshal gyi ltad mo byed pa der lha mo de dag rnams dang lha de dag rnams rim gyis 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467b-13: de nas lha de dag rnams kyis sprul ba de dag gis glu'i sgra rnams thos par gyur pa dang bcu 'gyur gyis shin tu snyan par gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:467b-15: rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams rtse dga' ba la mchog tu'ang zhugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-0: lha mo de dag rnams kyis kyang de kho na bzhin du @468a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-2: de nas sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams kyis dal bus dal bus legs par babs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-3: de nas phan tshun du gang gi tshe khyad par zhugs bar mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-4: sprul pa de dag rnams kyi khyad par gyis tshul thams cad kyis mi mdzes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-6: gzugs kyi rgyags pa nye bar bcom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-7: de dag rnams kyis byas pa'i cha byad du byas pa rnams bcom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-9: rang gi lus las kun tu 'byung ba'i 'od rnams bcom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-10: sprul pa'i glu'i dbyangs rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-11: ngo bo nyid kyi glu'i gdangs rnams nye bar bcom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-14: sprul pa'i tshad dang kha dog dang dbyibs rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-15: lha de dag rnams lha mo dang lhan cig tu bcas pa rnams kyi tshad dang kha dog dang dbyibs rnams nye bar bcom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-16: de bzhin du yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i yul gyi bde ba rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-17: yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i yul gyi bde ba rnams nye bar bcom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-18: ji lta ji ltar ngo bo nyid kyi lha rnams kyi rgyags pa chen po thams cad chung ngur byas par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-19: thabs rnams thams cad kyis gang gi tshe lha de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468a-20: ngo bo nyid kyi lha de dag rnams rnam par 'dre bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468b-0: de ltar de dag rnams @468b kyi sa ngo bo nyid kyi lha rnams kyi gzi brjid de dag de bzhin du zil gyis gnon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468b-1: ji ltar dzambu'i gling du nyi ma shar bar gyur pa na gza' dang skar ma dang rgyu skar rnams kyi gzi brjid nyams par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468b-2: de bzhin du sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams kyis lha rnams thams cad kyis 'od zer zil gyis gnon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468b-3: ji ltar lha rdzas kyi rol mo rnams kyis mi rnams zil gyis gnon par byed pa de bzhin du rol mo rnams kyang mngon par zil gyis gnon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468b-4: glu rnams kyang de bzhin du zil gyis gnon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468b-5: tshad dang mdog dang dbyibs rnams kyang de bzhin du zil gyis gnon te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468b-6: ji ltar 'thab bral bas mi rnams zil gyis gnon pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468b-7: de nas ngo bo nyid kyi lha de dag rnams ngo tsha ba dang bcas pas gang na de mtsho chen po de yod pa'i 'gram der nye bar 'gro bar byed do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468b-8: ngo tsha ba dang ngo mtshar bar gyur pa dang bcas pa'i yid kyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468b-9: de nas sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams mtsho de'i gang na padma chen po yod pa yin pa de dang nye bar mngon par gnas nas glu len par byed par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:468b-11: rgod par gyur pas kyang lha rdzas kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'i bde ba rnams dang yang dag par ldan pas mtsho de'i steng gi padma chen po'i 'dab ma rnams kyi bar du sang nas gar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-1: byed pas kyang rgyags pa la don gcig pa rnams yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-2: 'thab bral ba rnams las ches lhag pa'i lus can de dag rnams kyis rang bzhin gyi lha rnams la phan par bya ba'i don du de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsnyad pa glu dang legs par 'dres pa rnams bshad pa ji ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-3: lha yi bde ba thams cad ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-4: las dang cha 'dra mthong ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-5: gson pa dang ni bde ba yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-6: las zad pas ni 'jig pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-7: de phyir rnam pa du ma'i bde //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-8: ji srid zad par ma gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-9: de srid du ni bsod nams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-10: bsod nams ma byas las sdug bsngal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-11: gson tshe myur ba nyid du 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-12: lang tsho myur bar 'gro ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-14: bag med pa la dga' ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-15: lus can kun gyi bde ba kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-17: gson pa yang ni mthar 'joms na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-18: bag med la ni dga' ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-19: dbang po rnams kyi spyod yul la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-20: mi skye bar ni bya mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-21: dbang rnams rang gi spyod yul las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-22: gang phyir shes pas zlog par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-23: de phyir rtag tu shes pa bsten //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-24: shes pa yongs su spong ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-25: skyon rnams rtag tu spong mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-26: de ni don min myu gu yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469a-27: bag med pa las 'dod chags skye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-0: sdug @469b bsngal gyis bsgrubs skye ba 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-1: de dag 'khor ba'i lam yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-2: bag med yongs su spangs pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-3: yul 'di ston par mi byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-4: de la skyon ni mi dmigs la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-5: skyon gyi dngos po grol ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-6: sdug bsngal ljon shing rtsa bar ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-7: bag med 'di gcig rnams par gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-8: bag med pa la mchog gyur pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-10: gzugs ni rtag pa mthong ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-11: mnyam du 'gro ba'i bde ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-12: srid nas srid par dngos po 'di'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-14: yul ni 'ching ba rnams kyi rgyu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-15: ji lta ji ltar bstan byas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-16: de lta de ltar rnam 'phel te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-17: bud shing las ni me ji bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-18: ngoms pa med pa'i sdug bsngal 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-20: 'khor ba las ni kha log pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-21: gang zhig sred bral de bde yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-22: de phyir gang zhig mthar thug bde //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-23: bde bde de ni bde bar brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-25: mthar thug pa yi bde pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-26: de ltar bag med pa rnams kyis shin tu bcom par ma gyur pa'i mu su lundha sa sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams kyis lha de dag rnams la glu la bsnyad nas mchog tu snyan pa snga na ma thos pa'i glu rnams len par byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:469b-27: ji ltar bstan pa dang kun tu bsras pa'i sprul pa'i de kho na nyid rnams ngo bo nyid kyi lha dag gis thos nas nyan par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470a-0: de nas lha de dag gis tshigs @470a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470a-1: dbyangs kyis bsnyed pa thos nas srid pa snga ma la goms par byas par gyur pa yongs su dag pa'i rgyud gang yin pa ji ltar lha de dag gis ches gtso bor gyur pa rnams kyis glu dbyangs kyi don kun tu rtogs nas skyo ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470a-2: de nas yang bdag cag rnams kyi drung na rim pa rnams thams cad kyis khyad par du 'phags par gyur pa de dag gang gis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs 'di dag rnams legs par bshad pa yin yang de dag rnams gang yin pa'i drung na bdag cag rnams ci'i phyir thams cad du shin tu dman par gyur ces de ltar thabs de dag rnams kyis 'thab bral gyi bdag pos snying la legs par go bar byas te bag med pa rnams dang bral bar yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470a-3: thabs gzhan rnams kyis kyang phan par byed pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470a-4: de ltar lha de dag rnams gzugs la sogs pa'i bde ba'i rgyags pa dag gis rgyags par gyur nas log par ltung bar 'gyur ba rab tu ma mthong ba de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470a-5: phyis 'chi 'pho ba'i dus na 'gyod pa'i mes bsregs nas phyi nas yang dmyal ba'i mes sreg par 'gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470a-6: de la thabs 'di dag gis rang bzhin pa'i lha de dag rnams la phan par 'dod pas mu su lu ndha des kun skyo ba skyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470b-0: de nas lha de dag rnams yid byung bar gyur pa rtogs nas yang sprul pa @470b gzhan yang shin tu yid 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i sprul pa rnams byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470b-1: ji ltar padma'i 'dab ma rnams nyid la rnam grangs du ma rnams kyis dga' bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470b-2: yongs su glu len par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470b-3: rnam grangs du mar 'gying bar yang byed pa de ltar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470b-4: ji ltar rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis nam yang 'ga' zhig tu'ang mthong ma myong ba'i rtsed mo de dag rnams de ltar rnam par du ma rnams su dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470b-5: rnam par rtog pa du ma rnams su dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470b-6: ches dga' ba du ma rnams su ngo bo nyid kyi lha de dag rnams kyi bag med pa dang nges par bral bar bya ba'i don du dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470b-7: ji ltar de dag rnams kyi rgyags pa kun nas spangs par 'gyur bar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470b-8: ngo bo nyid kyi lha de dag rnams kyis sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams kyi glu shin tu snyan par gyur pa rnams ji lta pa bzhin du thos pas ngo tsha bar gyur nas glu len par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470b-12: kun tu spyod par yang ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470b-14: sprul pa de dag rnams kyi la lta bar 'dod pa'i yid rtse gcig pas thams cad nyid gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:470b-15: de dag rnams kyis kyang rnam par du mar gar dang glu dang rgod pa dang 'gying bag dang rnam par rtog pa du mar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471a-0: dga' bar 'gyur ba du mar gzhan rnams dang 'dra ba ma yin pa'i rnam pa du ma rnams kyang padma'i 'dab ma rnams @471a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471a-1: la song nas lha de dag rnams glu len par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471a-3: de nas gang gi tshe rang bzhin gyis lha de dag rnams kyi yid las su rung bar byas par go nas mu su lundha des sprul pa gnyis pa byed pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471a-4: ji ltar padma'i 'dab ma rnams la gnas nas glu len par byed pa'i lha de dag rnams nyid kyi padma'i 'dab ma gcig sprul pa'i lha rnams kyis legs par gang ba rab tu lhung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471a-5: de nas mtsho de la lha de dag rnams las kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471a-8: byung nas yang nub bo; ;la la dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471a-9: lus rnams chu la brten nas rgyal bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471a-11: phan tshun kun tu 'khyud par byed pa dang nub par yang gyur nas ji lta ba bzhin du skyobs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471a-12: bskyab par gyis dang zhes de ltar phan tshun du 'bod par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471a-13: 'bod par byed pas kyang phan tshun du rten par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471a-14: du bar yang byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471a-15: lhung ba dang bying bar yang gyur pa'i nyam nga ba chen po dang 'jigs pa chen po dang sdug bsngal chen po rnam pa du ma de dag rnams mtsho chen po de'i 'gram du song bar gyur pa'i lha de dag rnams kyis khyad par du mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471b-0: de nas 'dab ma gcig de dag tu zags pa dang mnyam pa thabs kyis rjes thogs su 'dab ma gzhan sprul ba'i lha rnams kyis kun @471b tu gang bar gyur pa'i 'dab ma de dang de dag rnams zags shing zags shing rnam par rgyas pa'i mtsho chen por lhung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471b-1: sprul pa'i lha de dag gang yin pa de dag rnams thams cad kyang 'jigs pa chen po rnams su lhung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471b-4: kha cig 'gyur ldog byas pas smad par gyur nas rnam par khro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471b-6: de na gar song ba mthong bar gyur pa nyid kyang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471b-8: chur 'gyur ldog byas pas shi bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471b-11: de bzhin du lha'i bu mo rnams kyang shin tu rnam par nyams par gyur cing rnam par khros /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471b-12: 'khrugs pa dang bying bar gyur pas lha de dag rnams la 'ju sa 'phyang nas nub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471b-13: ji ltar gang gi tshe gru zhig par gyur na de'i tshe gang dag der zhugs pa de dag rnams med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471b-15: de bzhin du mi dge ba'i chu rnams kun tu rgal bar byed pa na sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams kyang 'dab ma rnams las lhung bas nges par nub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:471b-16: de'i rjes la rnam par rgyas pa'i mtsho chen por padma'i 'dab ma gsum pa lhung bar gyur pas de na'ang lha gang dag gnas pa de dag rnams thams cad kyang rdob bzhin du 'og tu bying zhing nub nas thams cad kyang ma mthong bar song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472a-0: de'i rjes thogs la sprul pa'i lhas kun nas gang ba'i 'dab ma gzhan dag kyang rab @472a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472a-2: de dag na'ang de'i lha gang dag de la kun tu 'dus shing legs par tshogs pa de dag rnams kyang mtsho rnam par rgyas pa de dag tu nges par lhung bar gyur nas kyang phan tshun kun tu chags par gyur cing rnam par khros pas kyang phan tshun du 'bod par byed cing kun tu 'bying bar gyur pas kyang dus ring du rnam par; rjod par byed cing rnam par brjod pas kyang mtsho de'i nang du lhung bar 'gyur ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472a-3: de ltar lan brgya phrag rnams su dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472a-4: ci ste na lan stong phrag rnams su'ang bye brag mang du rnam par rjod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472a-5: mtsho de'i nang du nges par lhung zhing nges par bying ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472a-7: lan du mar yang 'og gi'ang srid pa rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472a-8: de'i rjes thogs la lha rnams nyid kyis kun nas gang ba'i padma'i 'dab ma gzhan rnams kun tu lhung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472a-9: de dag rnams lhung bar gyur pa de'i rtsa ba las kyang sgra chen po rnam pa du mar kun tu byung bar gyur pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472a-11: ri'i rtse mo kun tu nyil pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472a-13: rgya mtsho 'khyoms par gyur pa rnams kyang kun tu 'byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472a-14: de ltar 'dir tug com gyi sgra de dag rnams rab tu byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472a-15: sgra de dag thos nas kyang gang dag rang bzhin du gnas pa'i lha de dag rtsa ba nas 'gyel zhing gnas par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472b-0: rnam pa du mar khyad par du mi rig @472b bde dag rnams de dag gis mthong bar gyur nas shin tu yi mug cing 'jigs pa dang mchog tu skyo ba'i yid du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472b-1: gzhan yang gang na mtshor song ba'i sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams rab tu ltung bar gyur pa'i de dag 'khor rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i yid kyi gnas pas gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472b-2: snga na ma mthong ba 'di rnams ci yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472b-3: lha rnams thams cad kyis kyang sngar nam yang de ltar nyams su myong bar ma gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472b-4: shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal ba'i go 'phang lha rnams kyis nyams su myong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472b-5: zhes rnam pa de lta bu'i mchog tu 'jigs par gyur pa'i shin tu mi rigs pa rnams de skad du rjod par yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472b-6: de ltar de dag rnams sems par byed pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472b-7: phan tshun du gleng bar yang byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472b-8: mchog tu skyo ba'i yid du'ang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472b-9: 'dab ma gzhan nyid kyang rab tu lhung bar gyur pas lha mo rnams thams cad kyang shin tu nyams smas par gyur nas phan tshun du rnam par khro bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472b-10: h'a yongs su skyobs dang zhes bya ba de ltar phan tshun du rjod par yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472b-11: ji ltar gang dag bag med par gyur pas bag med par rgyu bar byed pa de dag rnams kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:472b-13: rnam par lhung ba'i rnam pa rnams kyang 'di 'dra ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473a-1: phan tshun rnam par khro ba rnams las rang bzhin pa'i lha de dag rnams kyi yid las su rung bar byas te bag med pa nyams dma' bar gyur pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473a-2: mya ngan las 'des pa'i chos rnams sgrub pa la las su rung ba yin par mthong nas mchog tu gzhan la phan pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i mu su lundha des de dag rnams la yang phan pa'i don du'ang lha de dag dang bcas pa'i padma'i snying po de nyid mi mthong bar bsgyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473a-3: des 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po bag med pas na bag med par rnam par spyod par byed pa gang yin pa de dag rnams kyi yid dge legs dang ldan par gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473a-4: de ltar legs par skyes par gyur nas dus 'di nyid du ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473a-5: 'di dag rnams dam pa'i chos bsgrags pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473a-6: dam pa'i chos bsgrag par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473a-7: de nas dar de ltar rig nas mtsho der 'jigs pa chen po'i rim pa du ma gzhan nyid kyang sprul par byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473a-8: 'dab ma brgya'ang 'jigs pa dang sprul pa'i lha rnams kyang 'jigs pa chen po rnam pa du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473a-10: mtsho la yang 'bying bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473b-0: de bzhin du rnam pa du mar kun tu rjod @473b par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473b-1: yid nyams smas pa kun tu 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473b-2: 'chi bar 'gyur ba du ma'ang sprul par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473b-3: de dus ring du rtogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473b-4: de dag gis kyang rang bzhin gyi lha de dag gi 'gros bcom zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473b-5: ji lta ba bzhin du yid nyams smad nas gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa na'ang de ltar byung ba'i 'gros bcom nas ji ltar de dag gis mthong nas 'gyur bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473b-6: mthong ba'i rjes thogs nyid la yid shin tu nyams dmas shing skyo ba skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473b-7: de ltar thams cad byas nas padma'i nang gi snying po la zhugs te bag med pa'i lha de dag rnams nyid dang lhan cig tu lta bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473b-8: lhan cig tu spyod par yang gyur pa na'ang shar bar gyur pa legs par mngon par mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473b-9: gzhan la phan pa dang rjes su 'dzin pa la rab tu zhugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473b-10: mchog tu snying rje che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473b-11: gzhan rnams la phan pa dang rab tu ldan pas legs par zhugs pas kyang lha de dag rnams kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pas padma'i snying po de kun tu btang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473b-12: sbrul pa de dag rnams kyang mi snang bar byas nas dbugs 'byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:473b-13: ji ltar shin tu bar yang 'jigs pa'i gnas rnams su lha dag 'gro bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-1: tu 'jigs par gyur pa'i gnas rnams su rab tu 'gro ba na bag med pas 'jigs pa'i gnas rnams su 'gro bar ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-2: bag med pas rnam par rgyu ba rnams kyi gnas skabs ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-4: bag med pas rgyu bar byed pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-5: bag med pa'i rtsa ba las shin tu 'jigs par 'gyur ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-6: bag med pa la sdug bsngal rnams mi 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-8: de nas dus de dag tu mu su lundhas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs rnams brjod pa ji ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-9: bag med la ni mngon dga'i byis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-10: rtag tu sdug bsngal skal ldan yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-11: gang yang bag med rnam par spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-12: rtag tu bde ba'i skal ldan de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-13: sdug bsngal ljon shing thams cad kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-14: rtsa ba bag med par brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-15: de phyir sdug bsngal yongs spong bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-16: bag med pa ni rnam par spongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474a-17: de nas lha rang bzhin pa de dag gis kyang mu su lundha de mngon par mthong nas de dag rnams yid rnal du phebs pa dang ches rab tu dga' bar gyur nas gang na 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag de yod pa der thams cad nyid nye bar brgyugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474b-0: ji ltar lha bdag cag rnams kyi mgon po bdag cag rnams @474b kyi mgon po bdag cag 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474b-1: padma'i snying po la lha'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas legs par gnas te bdag cag rnams rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan du 'dir byon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474b-2: de ltar phan tshun du rig par gyur nas gang na padma'i snying po yod pa der thams cad nyid nye bar 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474b-3: de nas nye bar song ba dang padma'i snying po la rang nyid legs par gnas pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474b-4: mu su lundha kun tu gnas pa yin no; ;padma'i snying po'i sengge'i khri la kha dog mtshungs pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa rnams kyi lha gzhan gyis zhabs 'bring byas nas nye bar 'gro ba na lha de dag gis mu su lundha de la 'di skad ces brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474b-6: lha 'di dag rnams gang yin pa la de ltar mtho 'tsham par byed pa 'di gang dag ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474b-8: kun tu bskor bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474b-9: chu rnams la'ang kun tu nub par byed par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474b-10: rnam par khro bar yang byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474b-11: rnam pa mang po'i gnas skabs rnams kyang byed du 'jug lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:474b-12: de nas mu su lundha des lha de dag rnams la 'di skad ces brjod de ji ltar /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-3: bag med pa'i skyon 'di dag rnams yin par khyed rnams kyis legs par ma go'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-4: de nas de'i dus na mu su lundha sa tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa ji ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-5: 'byung po thams cad kyis mi mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-6: las rnams kun gyis rgyal ba min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-8: 'chi bdag ces ni mngon par brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-10: phung po skye mched 'joms byed po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-13: 'di yis khrid par gyur pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-14: de 'ga' zhig la'ang stobs mi dmigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-15: chos ma gtogs pa de yi phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-16: chos ni skyob pa'i mchog tu brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-17: gson pa yang ni myur bar 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-18: myur bar lang tsho 'gro ba yin; ;'chi bdag myur bar 'ong ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-19: bag med pa yis dga' ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-20: lus can rnams kyi bder gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-21: thams cad 'jig pa'i rgud pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-22: gson pa yang ni mthar 'joms kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-23: bag med pa la dga' ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-24: dmyal ba yi dvags dud 'gror ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475a-25: las kun zad nas 'gro dgos kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-0: shes kyis @475b sdug bsngal mi bzad 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-1: dga' bar ma byed bag med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-2: srid gsum ngam grog srid 'di gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-3: mi rtag pa yi thabs 'og yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-4: skye zhing 'chi ba de lta la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-5: bag med pa la dga' ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-7: rgas pa yis ni gzhon ba 'joms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-8: so gsod pa ni nad kyis 'joms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-9: bag med pas ni dga' ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-10: las kyi thag pas rnam bcings nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-11: sems kyi 'phyang mo la legs brten //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-12: sems can srid pa gsum na 'khyams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-13: dga' bar ma byed bag med la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-14: skyid de ba yang sdug bsngal 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-15: sdug bsngal can yang rnal phebs gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-16: rje dpon yang ni bran 'gyur gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-17: bag med pa la dga' ma byed; ;ma yang chung mar 'gyur ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-18: chung ma yang ni dgra 'di nyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-20: bag med pa la dga' ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-21: nags dang nye nags brag rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-22: lha yi tshogs kyis brgyan pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-24: bag med pa la dga' ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-25: lus can rnams kyi bde ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-26: g-yo zhing 'tshe dang bcas pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-27: yid ches med dang stong pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-28: bag med pa la dga' ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-29: sdug bsngal gyis gzir skye 'di yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:475b-30: rga dang nad kyi snod yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-0: @476a *// skye ba nges par 'chi ba yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-1: gang gis thams cad du nus min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-2: skye ba thams cad 'chi ba'i mtha'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-3: de bzhin lang tsho rgas pa'i mtha'; ;rmi lam lta bu'i 'dod pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-4: bag med pas ni dga' mi bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-5: chu shing lo ma dang mtshungs dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-6: glog rnams dang yang rab tu mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-7: slu bar byed pa thams cad la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-8: bag med pas ni dga' ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-9: yul gyi spyod yul can dbang bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-10: rgyal bar bya bar nus ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-11: dbang po rnams kyi rang yul las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-12: gang phyir shes pas zlog par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-13: de ltar mu su lundha des lha de dag rnams kyi yid skyo bar gyur ba la gzhan la phan pa'i don du tshigs su bcad pa rnams ji lta bar brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-14: gzhan yang 'thab bral ba'i bdag po de nyid kyis lha rnams kyi bag med pa la rnam par gshe'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-15: ji ltar bag med pa'i mun par 'og tu nub pa de dag ma mthong ba rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-16: sdug bsngal chen por gyur pa dang rgas pa dang 'chi ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;ji ltar lha de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476a-17: khyed rnams nyid dang mtshungs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476b-0: phyin ci log rnams la ji lta bar zhugs nas bag med pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams @476b yin te; phyin ci log nyid la zhugs pa rnams thams cad la yongs su skyob par byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476b-2: gang khyed rnams kyi khyad par las tshul thams cad kyis khyad par du 'phags pa rnams bag med pas brlags par gyur nas tshad dang mdog dang dbyibs dang nye bar longs spyod pa dang khang bu dang 'od zer dang lha mo dang skye ba rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa de dag rnams khyed rnams kyis mngon sum du 'gyur pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476b-3: ji ltar na yongs su spyad par 'gyur ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476b-4: ji ltar na 'khor rnams dang bcas pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476b-5: phyin ci log la zhugs pa de'i tshe de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476b-6: bag med pa'i skyon gyis yin par mngon par mthong ba'i phyir na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476b-7: thams cad la dus thams cad du thabs rnams thams cad kyis bag med pa yongs su spang bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476b-8: gang cung zad cig mtsho 'di 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i bag med pa'i mtsho de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476b-9: dug gis zin pa rnams las kyang shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476b-10: gang 'ga' zhig me rlung dang bcas par gyur pa de dag rnams kyi drung na bag med pa'i me kun tu rtog pa'i rlung dang bcas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:476b-11: shin tu bar yang lhag pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477a-1: mun pa dus ring du 'thibs pa rnams las bag med pa'i rang bzhin gyi mun pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477a-2: de dag rnams las zla med par khyad du gyur pa yin te; thog ma med pa'i dus nas kun la ring du 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477a-3: gang 'ga' zhig dgra bo glags gcod par byed pa rnams kyi nang nas bag med pa'i dgra ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477a-4: de dag rnams kyi drung na khyad par du 'phags pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477a-5: yul gyi grogs kyis kun nas glags gcod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477a-6: gang cung zad mtshon char brjod par bya ba so rnon po de dag rnams kyi nang nas bag med pa'i mtshon gyi so rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477a-7: lhag par rno ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477a-8: ngan song du log par ltung ba'i rtse mo rnon po rnams yod pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477a-9: gang 'ga' zhig sbrul dug can du gyur pa de dag rnams kyi drung nas bag med pa'i sbrul gyi drug gis sems can thams cad kyi srog nges par 'phrog par byed pa'i dug chen po de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477a-10: khyad par du 'phags pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477a-11: byis pa'i skye bo rnams thams cad kyi sems stobs nges par 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477a-12: gang cung zad grogs po'i gzugs can grogs po ma yin pa rnams las bag med pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477a-13: de dag rnams kyi nang na bla lhag pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477b-0: @477b dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang kun tu 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477b-1: gang cung zad 'ching bar gyur pa lcags sgrog gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477b-3: thag pa las byas pa de dag rnams kyi nang nas bag med pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477b-5: zhe sdang 'thug po dang kun tu 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477b-6: gang 'ga' zhig pas bla lhag par gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477b-7: dgon par rnam par 'khyams par gyur pa rnams la chu dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477b-11: bzhon pa 'ang med pas sems can rnams thams cad sdug bsngal bar byed pa po de dag rnams kyi nang nas bag med pa'i dgon pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477b-12: shin tu bla lhag pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477b-13: bde ba'i chu dag dang skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi ljon shing gi grib ma rnams las tha mar sems can rnams thams cad sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477b-14: gang 'ga' zhig rnam par slu bar byed pa po'i ngo bo don med par gyur pa mthong ba rnams las 'di dag gi ji lta ba'i don ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477b-18: smig rgyu rnams so; ;de dag rnams kyi drung na'ang bag med pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477b-19: shin tu lhag pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:477b-20: yul gyi nye bar longs spyod pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-0: g-yo bar gyur pa ji lta ba'i don dang bral @478a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-1: bas na zo chun 'khor mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-3: smig rgyu rnams las kyang bla lhag par stong pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-4: gzhan yang cung zad rab tu ltung bar byed pa gang yin pa'i yul du gyur pa rnams cung zad yod pa'i ngam grog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-5: g-yang sa dang 'dra ba de dag rnams kyi drung na'ang bag med pa shin tu lhag pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-6: ngan song du log par ltung ba rnams nges par yang nyams su myong bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-7: de ltar bag med pa 'dis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-9: srog chags su gyur pa rnams thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-10: 'gro ba lngar skyes par gyur pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-11: khams gsum du gtogs pa rnams kyang log par ltung bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-12: de'i phyir thams cad kyis thams cad kyang rab tu brtson pa thams cad kyis gnas skabs thams cad du sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-13: bde ba 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang sdug bsngal rnams kyi rtsa ba 'di yongs su spang bar gyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-16: de nas yang de'i tshe na mu su lundha des tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-18: bag yod pa ni dga' bar brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478a-19: bag med sdug bsngal skal ldan yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-0: bag yod @478b bag med pa dag gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-1: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-2: de ltar lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag dam pa'i lam ji lta ba bzhin du ston par byed pa po des lha de dag rnams la rjes su 'doms par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-3: de la lha de dag rnams thams cad kyang yid las su rung bar byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-4: dbang po rnams rgyas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-5: dbang po rnams rab tu dang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-6: yid rtse gcig tu gyur pas nyan par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-7: mu su lundha padma'i snying po la sengge'i khri la gnas pa de la 'di ltar yang rjod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-8: bdag cag rnams la shin tu phan par gyur pa dang mthar thug par bde ba gang yin pa de dag kyang 'dir brjod lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-9: bdag cag rnams la phan pa dang bde ba rnams kyang khyed nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-10: bdag cag rnams kyis ci bgyi ba'ang lha nyid kyi zhal snga nas bka' stsal tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-11: ji ltar tshig 'di dag rnams brjod pa dang 'thab bral gyi bdag po des 'di skad ces brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-12: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-13: thar pa'i spyod pa rnams rig cing rtogs la mkhyen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-14: skyon rnams thams cad las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:478b-15: yon tan rnams thams cad dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479a-0: sems can rnams thams cad kyi @479a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479a-1: yang gtso bor gyur pa'i sangs rgyas de la skyabs su song dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479a-2: sdug bsngal rnams thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479a-4: bag med pa rnams dang bral ba yin pas de la skyabs su song na gong na med pa'i 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rnams thams cad las yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro; ;de nas yang nges par mu su lundha'i drung nas lha de dag rnams kyis tshig 'di dag thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479a-5: thams cad nyid kyis pus mo rnams sa gzhi la btsug te 'khor dang bcas pa rnams gus pa legs par skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479a-6: don la dbang po rnams rgyas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la legs par gus pa skyes pa mgo bo kun tu btud par gyur pas rab tu phyag 'tshal te gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar byed pas kyang skyabs su song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479a-8: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams la'ang legs par skyabs su 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479a-9: yid shin tu rab tu dang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479a-10: bag med pa rnams la'ang rnam par smod par byed cing bshags par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479b-0: gang dag bag med pa'i lha de dag rnams kyis bzod par mi nus pa rnams mang por mi bzad pa @479b rnam pa du ma rnams thams cad kyis shin tu sdug bsngal ba rnams mthong ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479b-1: de nas mu su lundha'ang lha de dag rnams kyi yid kun tu skyo par gyur pa de dag rnams legs par mthong nas slar nyid kyang cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma rnams byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479b-2: yud tsam gcig la'ang rnam pa du mar gcig tu gyur nas brgyar 'gyur ro; ;stong du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479b-4: yul tsam la'ang cha byad du ma dag tu byas pa'i dbyibs rnams su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479b-5: yud tsam gcig la rnam pa du ma'i cha byad dag gis mtshungs par byas pa'i dbyibs rnams su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479b-6: yul tsam nyid la nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags nas rin po che'i khang bu sna tshogs pa rnams kyis kun tu gang ba rnams na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479b-7: gzugs dang cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479b-8: yud tsam la'ang chur 'bying bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479b-9: mgo bo stong du gyur nas kyang rin po che sna tshogs pa'i dbu rgyan dang dpung rgyan 'bar ba rnams kyis brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:479b-10: nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i gzi brjid can lha'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas nye ba'i nags rnams thams cad du legs par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480a-1: bar byed pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas padma chen po de nyid kyi steng du 'byung bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480a-2: rang gi gzi brjid rnams kyis lam mer gyur par lha de dag rnams kyis lus shin tu blta bar dka' ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480a-3: gzhan yang mu su lundha de nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gzhan yang byed par gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480a-4: lha de dag rnams nyid kyis bag med pa kun nas bsnyung bar bya ba'i don du 'di lta ste; kha nas lha brgya stong kun tu 'byung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480a-6: khang bu'i steng du zhon nas rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 'od rnams kyis lus shin tu gsal bar gyur pa rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480a-8: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i cha byad 'dzin par gyur pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480a-9: glu'i rol mo rnams nye bar len par byed pa rnams lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480a-11: mchog tu lang tsho la bab pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas glu nye bar len pas mu su lundha'i kha nas byung nas 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480a-13: rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi padma gzhan dag rnams la nang du zhen nas snyan pa'i glu rnams len par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480b-0: rtsi'ang @480b lha rdzas kyi ro dang dri dang yang dag par ldan pa dag 'thung bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480b-1: lhan cig spyod pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lan brgya phrag rnams su dang /
