K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480b-2: gal te na lan stong phrag tu'ang mdzes par gyur pa dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i mchog rnams kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480b-3: rang gi 'od kyi dpal 'bar ba dang ldan pa rnams yin no; ;gzhan yang lha gzhan dag rnams rnam pa gzhan gyis mu su lundha de'i kha nas kun tu byung nas 'gro na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480b-4: rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul pa rnams la 'di lta ste; bya'i rgyab tu zhon pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480b-5: rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi bya rnams la mngon par zhon nas dga' bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480b-6: glu'ang len par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480b-7: lhan cig spyod pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas rab kyi mchog tu rangs pa'i yid kyis rnga skad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa nyan par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480b-8: bag med pas nye bar 'tsho ba rnams mu su lundha'i kha nas kun tu 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480b-9: lha ngo mtshar bar gyur pa mtshungs pa med pa'i gzugs gsal zhing sdug pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa gzhan yang rnam pa gzhan gyis lha rnams sprul par byed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:480b-10: ji ltar mu su lundha'i kha nas de dag nyid 'gro ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481a-0: autpala'i ze ba'i nang du zhon zhing rgyan rgyun par @481a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481a-1: 'brel ba'i dbus su song nas lha rdzas kyi rnga skad yan lag lnga pa nyan par byed cing lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lha rdzas kyi btung ba dag 'thung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481a-2: glu yang len par byed la lhan cig spyod pa'i 'khor rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lan brgya phrag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481a-3: ci ste lan stong phrag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481a-4: lan bye ba phrag rnams su'ang gzugs dang kha dog dang dbyibs dpe med pa'i lha'i bu mo mchog rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas dga' bar byed pa lha rdzas kyi nags dang nye ba'i nags su thabs du mar rab tu sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481a-5: nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon par 'phags nas sa gzhi dag bzhin du 'gro bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481a-6: rang bzhin pa'i lha de dag kyang glu de dag rnams nyan par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481a-7: de dag gi drung na yon tan brgyas lhag par snyan par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481a-8: de dag gi glu dang de dag gi gzugs dang de dag gi bde ba'ang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481a-9: de nas rang bzhin du gnas pa'i lha de dag snga na ma mthong ba'i ngo mtshar che ba de dag rnams kun tu mngon par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481a-11: ngo mtshar pa'i mchog dang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-1: rab tu dga' bar gyur las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-3: rmad du byung bar gyur nas ci'i phyir lha de dag rnams ji ltar na 'thab bral gyi bdag po mu su lundha'i kha nas 'gro bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-6: de ltar rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams sems par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-7: phan tshun rjod par yang byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-8: de ltar yang rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-9: gzhan yang mu su lundhas mchog tu gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gzhan dag byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-11: kha nas byung ba'i lha de dag las sna tshogs pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa ral pa ring po dang cod pan dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-13: lag na ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-14: lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i rgyan can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-15: gzi brjid kyi dpal 'bar ba'i ri dvags kyi pags pa 'dzin pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i drang srong dag kun tu 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-17: de nas lan stong phrag kyang kun tu byung nas nam mkha'i dkyil du 'khod nas tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyang bag med pa rnams dang kun nas bral bar bya ba'i don du rjod par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-19: sgyu ma lta bu'i srid pa las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-20: g-yo ba'i sems can 'di dag kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-21: thams cad 'chi ba'i mtha' can gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:481b-22: dngos pos bag med par ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-0: @482a *// srid pa kun nas 'phel ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-1: dga' bar 'gyur ba thams cad la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-2: tha mar smad pa'i gnas kyi ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-3: dngos pos bag med par ma byed; ;gang zhig skyes pa mi 'jig pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-4: gnas ni yod pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-5: gang phyir bde kun 'jig bcas kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-6: bag med ma byed dngos rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-7: gal te yon tan ldan pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-8: dga' bar mthong ba 'di thams cad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-9: thams cad rmi lam 'dra ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-10: srid pa'i bag med par ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-11: bag med dgra bo sdig can 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-12: dga' ba'i 'dod chags gdul dka' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-14: dngos pos bag med par ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-15: bde ba 'di ni yang dang yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-16: yongs su nyams pa kun tu 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-18: srid pas bag med par ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-19: 'og tu bar gyi bskal bar ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-20: skye rgu skyon gyis nye bar bcom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-21: las kyi lcags sgrog gis bcings nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-22: ji ltar mchil bas nya bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-23: thabs kyi rnam pa tha dad kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-24: lcags sgrog gcod par nus mod kyi; ;lha dang lha min thams cad kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-25: las kyi sgrog ni gcod mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-26: mthong ba med dang shin tu ring //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-27: skyes pa rgya che ba yi sgrog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482a-28: srid pa'i rgyud ni dam po 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-0: @482b gang yang 'ching ba byis pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-1: bdag cag lha rnams thams cad dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-2: mi dang de bzhin lha min med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-3: mi rtag nyid las rnam grol min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-4: mig med pas kyang mthong ba min; ;las rgya chen po'i rgyun rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-5: shin tu ring bar rab tu 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-6: ji srid shes pas rnam ma bcom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-7: de srid du ni sred pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-8: lnga yi gtsub shing las gyur pa'i; ;sred pa'i bud shing las byung ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-9: rnam rtog rlung ni stobs po ches //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-10: dus kyi mes ni shin tu sreg /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-11: byis pa blo gros chung rtag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-12: sdug bsngal des kyang kun tu ldan; ;phyin ci log gis yongs 'khrul bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-14: longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-15: chung ma bu la kun tu chags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-16: mi lus nad kyis rnam bcom nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-18: spyang kis ji ltar ri dvags kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-19: rab dang min pas mngon par 'joms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-20: de bzhin 'chi bdag dpung tshogs kyis; ;dang ba min pas mi rnams 'joms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-21: mnyam pa med dang khyad 'phags pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-22: sdug bsngal srid dang srid par mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-23: gti mug gis ni yongs bslus pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-25: shin tu bdag la byams pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-26: de kun sdig la brten pa'i mi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-27: gang dag bdag la byams min pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:482b-28: de la 'jig rten su mi byams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483a-0: @483a *// de ltar lha de dag gi bag med pa kun nas zhi bar bya ba'i don du mu su lundha'i kha nas 'byung bzhin pa'i drang srong rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis sbrul pas rang bzhin gyi lha rnams la ston par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483a-2: mthar thug par phan pa rnams yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483a-3: gzhan yang 'thab bral ba'i mnga' bdag des phan pa gzhan gyi sprul pa gzhan rnams byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483a-5: brang du ches mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa'i ngang ba dang ka randa pa dang ngang ngur dag gis nye bar mdzes par gyur pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rab tu dang ba mchog gi chu dang yang dag par ldan pa'i padma'i rdzing bu sprul par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483a-6: de'i padma'i rdzing bu de na brgya stong bye ba'i padma rnams legs par skyes pa 'di dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483a-7: mtsho chen por gyur pa rnams yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483a-8: rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483a-9: dpag tshad brgyar dri zhim po rnams 'byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483a-10: padma de dag rnams kyi nang du song ba'i snying po rnams la cod ban dang ldan pa'i mgo bo rnams rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang bar byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483b-0: rin po che rab kyi mchog gis rgyan du byas pa'i dbung rgyan can rnams 'dug pa la rnam pa du mar sna tshogs par rab kyi mchog tu lang tsho @483b la bab par mang po rnams kyi nye bar glu len par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483b-1: sengge'i khri la nye bar gnas pa la rnga yab dkar po nye bar g-yob bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483b-2: mgo bo la me tog gi mchog rnams dang ldan pa'i rjes su spyod pa gzhan rnams kyis mngon par bstod par byed par gyur pas rgyal bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483b-3: rgyal bar gyur cig ces kun nas dga' ba 'phel bar byed pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod par gyur pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483b-4: brgya byin la rab tu 'gran par byed pa'i rgyal po brgya stong sprul bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483b-5: gzhan la phan pa la rab tu zhugs par gyur pa'i 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag des rang bzhin pa'i lha rnams la go bar bya ba'i don du 'khor los bsgyur ba brgya phrag la 'gran par byed pa'i rgyal po brgya phrag stong yang yongs su sprul par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483b-6: gzhan yang gzhan la phan pa rnams la zhugs pas rdzu 'phrul gzhan byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483b-7: mu su lundha des rang gi lus rnams la sprul par byed pa rnams la dpag tshad brgya pa'i padma de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483b-8: brgya stong bya ba'i 'dab ma dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483b-9: rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi rnam par bkra ba'i 'dab ma rnams la lha'i bung ba rnams glu nye bar len par gyur pa'i sgra rnams kun tu brjod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:483b-10: dga' bar gyur cing mnyan par 'os pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-0: mthong na ches dga' bar gyur pa lha @484a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-1: rnams kyi padma chen po de'i sgra dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-2: dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'gro ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-3: yu ba rnams sprul par byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-4: bee d'urya'i rang bzhin rdo rjes legs par gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-5: aindra n'i la'i rin po che dang ldan pa mdzes pas 'ja' tshon rnams pas kyang ches lhag par dga' ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-6: padma chen po de'i nang du zhugs pa na mi'i rgyan dang cha byad sna tshogs pas rnam pa du mar brgyan pa'i lus mchog tu skyid pa rnams thong gshol gyis zhing las kyang byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-7: zhing gi nang la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs brjod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-10: sa gzhi 'di la zhing las byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-11: 'dod la chags pa'i mkhas min rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-12: 'chi ba legs par mthong ba min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-13: skad cig skad cig la 'grib pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-14: skye bo 'dod pa'i bsam pas rmongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-15: skad cig skad cig la zad pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-16: 'du byed go ba yang ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-17: mi rnams lang tsho mthar byed pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-19: nad med lo thog 'joms pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-22: lhar bcas lha min 'joms byed pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484a-24: 'ong ba mthong ba yang ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-0: lha dang @484b lha min dri za dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-1: sha za klu dang sren po la'ang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-2: gson pa mthar ni byed pa'i mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-4: skye bo gzhan yang rab bcom nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-5: rang gi skye la chags shing 'chums //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-6: srid gzhan 'gro ba'i skye gtong yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-7: rmongs pas bcings pa'i skye bo rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-8: bu dang tsha bo yang tsha dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-9: mi gang de yi rigs gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-10: de dag thams cad med gyur kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-11: khyod ni chags pas 'ching bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-12: de ltar sprul pa de dag gis gzhan la phan pa bsgrub pa'i don du tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-13: rang bzhin gyi lha rnams kyis kyang thos shing thos par gyur nas kyang yid kyis 'thung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-14: yul rnams la'ang shin tu bag med bar yang mi 'gyur ro; ;de nas gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gzhan shin tu dga' ba rnams gzhan la phan pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag des sprul par byed pa rnams ni; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-15: yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad las rgyan dang cha byad sna tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-16: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:484b-18: kha cig ni; kha dog du ma rnams dang dbyibs du ma rnams dang 'gro ba du ma rnams dang ldan pa'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485a-1: ba gnyug mar gnas par gyur pa'i rgyan dang cha byad can rnams kun tu 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485a-2: 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag de'i ba spu'i khung bu rnams thams cad las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485a-3: lus kyi mtha' rnams ma lus pa las 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485a-4: ji ltar rjes su mthun ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485a-5: gnas skabs ji lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485a-6: de dag gi rigs rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485a-7: rjes su spyod pa rnams ji lta ba'i 'khor gyis glu len par byed pa dang gar byed pa dang rgod par bye dpa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485a-9: mi rnams dang rjes su 'tsham par gyur ba'i longs spyod mchog tu yid 'phrog bar byed pa rnams dang yang dag par ldan pas gar byed pa dang rgod par byed pas kyang mi rnams kyis rgyal po bde ba rnams la nye bar longs spyod par byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485a-10: de bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485a-11: cha byad can gyi klu rnams kyang kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485a-18: mgo bzhi pa; kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485a-23: mgo bdun pa rnams yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485a-24: mdog dang dbyibs sna tshogs pa'i cod pan bcings pa'i mgo bo rnams yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485b-0: rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer gyis mchog tu gsal bar byas pa'i mgo bo can rnams sna tshogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra dang glu dang rgod pa dang 'gying ba dang rtse dga' @485b bas rjes su chags pa'i yid kyis bde ba rnams la nye bar longs spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485b-1: de bzhin du lha ma yin yang brtan pa la sogs pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyi mthar thug pas gzhir gtogs pa rnams sprul par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485b-2: 'thab bral gyi bdag po des bskal pa gzhan gyi brgya byin rtsa lag lhan cig rjes su spyod pa rnams kyis rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485b-3: mchog tu gzugs dang rgyan dang cha byad dang rab tu dang ba'i lha ma yin gyi bu mos rjes su 'brang bar gyur bas rnga skad yan lag lnga pa rnams thos nas dga' bar 'gyur bas yid ches su 'brel pas mchog tu skyid pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485b-4: lha ma yin gyi mnga' bdag rnams kyang khang bu na legs par gnas nas mu su lundha'i lus dang kha nas kun tu 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485b-5: sprul pa rnams thams cad kyang rtse bar byed bzhin pas mchog tu'ang dbe med pa'i bde ba rnams la nye bar longs spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485b-6: de bzhin du byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams kyang sprul par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:485b-7: sprin dang 'bres pa la sogs pa'i rin po che bcu la so sor gnas pa rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams las nye bar longs spyod par bya ba rnams cung zad kyis chung bar gyur pa'i nags dang nye ba'i nags dang rdzing bu dang padma'i tshal rnams dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba'i klung dang btung ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486a-0: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bde ba rnam pa @486a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486a-1: du ma rnams nyams su myong bar gyur bas rtse bar byed pa dang gar byed pa rnams kyang mu su lundha'i las po nyid las kun tu 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486a-2: de bzhin du ba lang spyod pa rnams kyi mi rnams dang rang gi bde ba dag dang yang dag par ldan par gyur bas mchog gi rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis gar byed par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486a-3: glu len par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486a-4: rgod par gyur pas mu su lundha'i lus nyid las kun tu 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486a-5: de bzhin du shar phyogs lus 'phags pa'i mi rnams kyi rang gi bde ba dang yang dag par ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486a-6: rab kyi mchog tu rangs pa'i yid kyis rtse bar gyur pa rnams kyang rang bzhin gyi lha rnams kyis mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486a-7: cho 'phrul gyi mchog rnams dang yang dag par ldan bar gyur pa'i 'thab bral ba rnams kyi bdag po des de ltar rnam pa du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486a-8: rnam par rtog pa du mas bag med pa rnams kun nas zhi bar bya ba'i don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486a-9: gzhan rnams la phan par bya ba'i don du'ang sprul pa de dag rnams byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486a-10: bag med pas rnam par rgyu bar byed pa'i lha de dag rnams ji ltar na mi rtag pa mngon sum du gyur pas sems kyi rgyu 'jam por 'gyur ba yin zhes rgyu 'di'i phyir na phun sum tshogs pa rnams ston par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486b-0: 'dod pa rnams kyi kun @486b nas ro myang ba'i don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486b-2: nyes dmigs rnams bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486b-3: rnam pa ji srid kyis 'dod pa rnams las nges par 'byung ba yin pa'i rgyu 'di dag gis lha rnams sprul pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486b-4: de la kun nas ro myang bar gyur pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486b-5: ji ltar thos par gyur pa bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod pa rnams kyi gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486b-11: nye bar longs spyod par bya ba'i bza' ba dang btung ba rnams mid par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486b-12: bud med rnams kyis yongs su bsnyen bkur ba dang 'khyud 'phyang byed ba rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486b-13: dbang po lnga ga'i nye bar longs spyod pa rnams thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par chags pa phun sum tshogs pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486b-14: 'dod pa rnams kyi ro myong ba zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486b-15: de la nyes dmigs rnams gang dag zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486b-16: thob par gyur ba'i 'dod pa gang dag yin pa rnams mngon par 'chums pa sngon du 'gro bas don du gnyer bar byed pa na nyams par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486b-17: thun mong ba rnams kyis dbang byas nas brlag par gyur pa'i bral bas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486b-18: gzhan dag gis 'phrog par gyur pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:486b-19: rdzas dang ldan pa las 'jig pa lngas nges par 'joms pa rnams kyang 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487a-1: dang chu dang chom rkun pa dang me la sogs pa rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487a-2: sdug bsngal gzhan dag rnams kyis kyang gzhi bor 'gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487a-3: rtag tu'ang dgra rnams kyis mngon par 'tshe bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487a-4: brlag gis dogs pa srung ba'i 'jigs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa rnams kyis 'jigs par yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487a-5: mngon bar zhen pa sngon du song bas gang dag gi yid kyang mya ngan gyis rtag tu ther zug dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487a-7: lus dang yid kyi 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs rnams yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487a-8: 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs des ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487a-9: 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa na'ang byis pa blo dman pa rnams la yi mug bas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal ba rnams skye bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487a-10: zug gzer 'di dag rnams kyang 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487a-11: gzhan yang 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487a-14: ma dang bu dag kyang lhan cig tu 'thab cing rtsod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487a-16: 'dod pa de'i rgyus gang dag la spun dang spun rnams lhan cig tu 'thab rtsod byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487a-17: gsod pa dang 'ching ba rnams kyang phul du phyin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487a-18: de dag kyang 'dod pa'i rgyu las yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487b-0: @487b la; 'dod pa rnams kyi don gyis de bzhin du rgyal po dang rgyal po'ang lhan cig tu 'thab cing rtsod bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487b-2: yul ljong rnams 'joms par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487b-3: phan tshun du gsod pa dang 'ching ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyi rtse mor phyin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487b-4: de la de dag nyid thams cad kyang 'dod pa rnams kyi don du yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487b-5: 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs 'di dag rnams kyang so sor shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487b-6: gang gi phyir 'khor ba rnams thams cad kyi 'ching ba yin pa'i 'dod pa 'di dag rnams bye brag tu rtogs par bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487b-7: de la rgyu 'di dag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487b-8: 'thab bral ba rnams kyi bdag po des lha de dag rnams la rnam pa du ma dang rnam par rtog pa du mas kyang rdzu 'phrul de dag rnams byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487b-10: mi rnams kyi 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs rnams yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487b-11: gang gzhan dag rnams lha phar zhog gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487b-12: rgyal po'ang rnam pa du ma dang bcas pa'i thabs rnams byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487b-13: gang yang mi gzhan dag 'dod pa'i don du rgya mtshor 'jug par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:487b-14: 'khrug pa la lhan cig tu 'jug par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488a-0: 'ching ba dang mya ngan dang ngal du ba dang sems khral dang 'thab rtsod dang 'jig pa la sogs pa'i don med pa rnams kun @488a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488a-2: de dag rnams thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i don du yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488a-3: de ltar mi rnams thams cad 'dod pa rnams kyi don du nyes dmigs rnams kun nas bzod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488a-4: ji ltar na yang lha rnams 'dod pa'i don du nyes dmigs rnams kun kyang bzod par byed pa yin na 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488a-5: lha gang dag lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g-yul 'gyed bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488a-7: de dag gi de dag rnams thams cad kyang 'dod pa rnams kyi don du yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488a-8: de bzhin du lha ma yin pa rnams kyang lha rnams dang lhan cig tu rtsod par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488a-9: g-yul 'gyed par byed pa gang yin pa 'di dag kyang 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488a-10: dngos po rnams kho na'i rgyags pa gang yin pa de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488a-11: 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488a-12: de la rgyu 'di rnams kyis kyang sprul pa rnams byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488a-13: gang yang klu rnams klu rnams dang lhan cig g-yul 'gyed par byed cing yul gzhan dag rnams kyang 'jig par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488a-14: glog dang thog la sogs pa'ang gtong bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag rnams thams cad kyang 'dod pa rnams kyi don du yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488b-0: yang gang dag dud 'gro rnams kyang phan tshun du @488b za bar byed ba dang gsod pa dang 'ching ba la sogs par byed pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488b-1: 'thab par yang byed pa de dag rnams thams cad kyang 'dod pa rnams kyi don du yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488b-3: de bzhin du yi dvags rnams kyang zas kyi rgyu mtshan gyis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488b-4: 'khrig pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis kyang phan tshun du ral gris gcod par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488b-5: de dag rnams thams cad kyang 'dod pa rnams kyi don du yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488b-6: gang yang 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs de dag rnams yin pa'i rgyu mtshan 'di dag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488b-7: 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag des bag med pa dang bral bar bya ba'i don du lha rnams la sbrul par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488b-8: de bzhin du dmyal ba rnams kyang phan tshun du mngon par 'joms bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488b-9: nyes par byed pa'i las rnams kyis skyes pa gzhan rnams su gang dag dang zhe 'gras par gyur pa de dag rnams rjes su dran par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488b-10: rjes su dran nas kyang 'khon de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488b-11: ral gri rnams kyis phan tshun du las byed par 'gyur ba kho na nye bar gnas pas bdag nyid dang gzhan dag rnams kyang gshog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:488b-12: de ltar yang dmyal ba rnams kyi nyes dmigs yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489a-0: de la rgyu mtshan 'di dag gis kyang 'dod pa rnams yongs su spong ba'i rgyur 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag de @489a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489a-1: sprul pa gzhan rnams byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489a-2: 'gro ba lnga po 'di dag rnams thams cad na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489a-3: 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yod par yin no; ;gang yang 'khor ba las kha phyir phyogs par gyur pa de dag rnams thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489a-4: gnas skabs thams cad du 'dod pa rnams las nges par 'byung bar ston par byed pa dang 'chad par yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489a-5: de la 'thab bral gyi bdag po des 'dod pa rnams kyi ro myang ba rnams bstan pa yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489a-6: nyes dmigs rnams kyang padma'i 'dab ma brgya po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489a-7: lha rnams rab tu lhung bar gyur pa rang bzhin pa'i lha rnams la cung zad cig bstan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489a-8: rgyas par yang lha dang mi rnams kyi nyes dmigs gzhan dag kyang bdag gis bstan par bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489a-9: nyes dmigs rnams legs par bstan nas nges par 'byung ba 'ang bdag gis bshad par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489a-10: thar pa'i sa bon gyi rgyur gyur pa rang bzhin gyis lha rnams la phan pa'i don du dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489a-12: gzhan yang lha de dag rnams la phan pa'i don du mu su lundha des 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs rnams mngon sum du byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489a-13: 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs rnams gzhan rnams su mthong bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489b-0: gzhan du'ang thos @489b par gyur pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis kyang 'khor ba la yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489b-1: de la rgyu mtshan 'dis lha de dag rnams la 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs rnams so sor sprul par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489b-2: de nas lha de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489b-4: klu rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams la ro myang bar byed pa de dag rnams bstan nas nyes dmigs kun tu ston par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489b-5: lha dang mi dang klu dang lha ma yin de dag rnams nyid kyang dus rnams mdor bsdu pa ji lta ba bzhin du yin pas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489b-7: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'dod pa rnam pa du ma rnams la longs spyad nas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byung bar gyur pa na de dag rnams ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du ston par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489b-8: rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i tshul gyis 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba rnams la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489b-9: ri'i drung dag nas rnam pa du mar gyur ba byi la dang gung dang gzig dang ser ba cag cag dang lce spyang dang ri bong dang sengge dang phag pa dang klu dang dom dang stag dang srin bya dang rta dang stom ra dang glang po dang khva ta dang su su ka dang chu srin dang rus sbal dang rnga mo rnams kyi gdong gcig pa dang gdong gnyis pa dang gdong gsum pa dang gdong mang por gyur pa de dag rnams kha cig gi lag na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:489b-10: thal ba dang sol me thogs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490a-0: @490a *// thams cad rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490a-2: me'i char 'bebs par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490a-3: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i ral gri kun nas 'phen par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490a-4: tho na kor kun nas 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra mang po rnams mngon par 'don par gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490a-5: ri dang thog 'bab pa dang mtshungs pa'i 'jigs pa chen po rnam pa du ma rnams yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490a-6: char 'byung ba'i sprin mthing nag dang mdog 'dra bar 'jigs pa chen por gyur pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa de'i mgo bo ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490a-7: ri dang mnyam par skra rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490a-8: lus rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa brgya phrag mang po rnams dang de bzhin du stong phrag mang po rnams kyis kun nas bskor nas lag na zhags pa thogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490a-9: ral gri dang mdung dar rdo rje dang rdzogs lag na thogs pa 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed pa rnams ri de dag gi khrod rnams nas byung ba nas nges par 'ong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490a-10: gang na sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams yod pa der nye bar rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-0: khros pas bzhin dmar po rnam par rol pa nye bar sgyur par byed pas sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po rnams kyi mdog gi me 'bar ba rnam par du mar char 'byung ba'i sprin mthing nag gi gseb rnams las bzhin du glog rnam @490b par 'byin pas nges par rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-1: sprul pa gzhan rnams kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-2: 'chi bdag lta bur gyur pas mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs rnams kyis gang na sprul pa de dag rnams yod par rgyug par byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-3: sna tshogs pa'i zhags pa dang lag cha thogs pa rnams la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-4: lcags kyi rang bzhin las lag pa gyen du rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa 'brug bzhin du sgra kun nas sgrog par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-5: lus rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-6: dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam gyi gzugs can rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-7: kha cig ni; mig brgya ba rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-9: mig bzhi brgya pa rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-10: de bzhin du lnga pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-15: mig brgya phrag bcu pa rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-16: mig rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam pa rnams rab tu 'ong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-17: kha dog sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang sngo skya rnams dang dbyibs rnam pa sna tshogs par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-18: 'byung po rnams thams cad 'jigs par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-19: ha ha zhes sgrog par byed pas kyang de dag thams cad ri'i rtse mo 'dud pa'i sgra dang 'dra bar so sor gsus pa 'phyang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-20: gsus pa gzhan dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-21: ri dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i gsus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:490b-22: ri dang mtshungs pa'i mgo bo can rnams yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491a-0: @491a *// mgo bo thung ngu dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491a-2: ring bar rab tu 'bar bar gyur ba'i skra dang lag pa ring por gyur pa dang sen mo rnams rab tu 'bar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491a-3: de bzhin du lus la skyes pa'i ba spu rnams kyang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491a-4: nye 'khor kun nas rab tu 'bar bar gyur ba'i ri dang mnyam pa rnams dus kyi ri chen po de las sprul pa byas pa rnams nges par 'ong pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491a-5: rdo rje'i thog 'bab par byed pa nye 'khor kun nas 'bebs par byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491a-6: yang rnam pa gzhan dag rnams kyis de bzhin du 'chi bdag gi pho nya nye bar rgyug par byed pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491a-7: nye 'khor rnams na bya rgod dang khva ta dang kadka dang lce sbyang dang rnga mo'i gdong can rnams lus la khrag gis rnam bar byugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491a-8: grog ma 'phungs pa'i lus can gyi lha de dag rnams mngon par mi dga' ba rnams nges par yod par byed pa yin no; ;dus kyi ri chen po de dag las sprul pa byas pa de dag rnams thams cad kyang gang na lha sprul pa'i lha de rnams yod bar der rlung gi shugs chen pos btab pa bzhin du sprin nag po glog dang bcas pas myur bar rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491b-0: de nas 'chi bdag lta bur byed bar gyur pa de dag rnams kyis lha de dag rnams dang nye bar 'ongs par gyur @491b nas sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams mngon par 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491b-1: de'i gting la kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491b-2: rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa'i lcags kyi thag pa rnams kyis dpung pa bcings nas 'dren par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491b-3: de bzhin du sprul pa'i lha gzhan de dag rnams nyid 'khrid par gyur pa mngon par mthong nas shin tu 'jigs par gyur pas phan tshun kun tu rgyug par byed do; ;de dag rnams kyang 'dzin par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491b-5: mgo la mngon par dmigs nas de dag nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'jigs par byed pa'i nga ro dag kun tu bton pas mig gi yul nges par mchong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491b-7: lha gzhan ma de dag rnams nyid bzung nas lcags kyi rang bzhin gyi rab tu bar ba'i thag pa rnams kyis mgrin pa bcings shing khyer te sa gzhi'i gseb tu rjes su thim nas mi mthong bar 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491b-8: 'chi bdag gi pho nya sprul pa byas pa gzhan de dag rnams kha cig gis kyang sprul pa'i lha rnams khyer nas chur bying bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491b-9: rab tu phros par gyur pas nang du nub par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491b-10: de ltar rnam pa du ma dang rnam par rtog pa du ma rnams su sprul pa de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:491b-11: 'jigs pa chen por gyur pa rnams yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-0: rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis kyang de dag rnams thams cad rmi lam gyi snang ba bzhin du mthong bar @492a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-3: ci yin zhes go bar 'gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-4: de nas de dag gang gi tshe sprul par gyur pa'i lha rnams la dmigs pa na de'i tshe sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag rnams kyis rjes su gdams par byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-6: longs spyod rgyags pas rgyags pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-7: bag med dbang gis 'jug pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-8: rmongs pa rnams kyi dus song nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-10: nags kyi dus 'di mtha' yas pa; ;dug gis gang ba ji bzhin nags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-11: sred pa'i myu gu rnam spangs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-12: dge ba don gnyer kun nas spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-13: mdzes pa'i las ni ma byas par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-14: bag med pas kyang bag med 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-16: blo gros ngan pa ci byar byod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-17: sred pa'i chur ni nub pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-18: sdug bsngal pha rol tu phyin min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-19: rga dang 'chi bar bying ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-20: bde ba de dag rnams la med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-21: skyes pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-22: rgyab na 'chi bdag nges par gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-24: bag med pas ni bag med byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-25: nyams pa med dang rnam mi shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-26: rtag tu glags gcod stobs pa che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-27: 'chi bdag dmag dpung shugs po che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492a-28: 'jig rten pas kyang go ba min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492b-1: zlog thabs med pa nyid kyang yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492b-2: sems can thams cad 'chi ba yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492b-3: bag med pas ni ma go'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492b-4: 'chi bdag gir gyur 'jig rten gsum; ;nye 'khor kun tu rnam par dpyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492b-5: rga dang na dang rgud pa yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492b-6: byas pa rnams kyis rig pa min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492b-7: de ltar sprul pa 'chi bdag gi pho nyar gyur pa de dag gis sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams la rjes su gdams par byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams brjod nas lan brgya phrag rnams su dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492b-8: lan stong phrag rnams su'ang srid pa rnams su khrid par byed cing de bzhin du 'dren par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492b-9: sdug bsngal chen po de dag rnams mthong bar gyur pas kyang rang bzhin gyi lha de dag gis bag med ba las shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba spangs nas yid 'byung bar 'gyur zhing thams cad kyang rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492b-10: de dag rtogs nas gzhan yang 'thab bral gyi bdag po des lha de dag rnams kyi yid gzhan yang ji lta ba bzhin du las su rung ba bya ba'i phyir slar nyid kyang sprul pa gzhan rnams sprul par byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:492b-11: lha de dag rnams nyid kyi phyir zhing nyid kyang khyad par du rtogs nas dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493a-0: dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'dod pa @493a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493a-1: rnams thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal po gang yin pa de dag rnams mu su lundha'i lus las nges par 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493a-2: lhan cig spyod par byed pa'i mchog tu lang tsho la bab pa rnams kyis phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493a-4: de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa de srid kyi gzugs dang phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyis kyang phun sum tshogs par gyur nas phyi nas yang rgyal po rnams lus gog por song ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493a-5: mgo bo kun skra dkar rnams kyis g-yogs par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493a-6: lus po rnams kun nas 'khums pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493a-7: lus la gnyer ma dang skra dkar rnams kyis kun tu gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493a-8: lus dbyug pa la kun nas brten pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493a-9: mchog tu rjud par gyur pa'i lus po can rnams las rnam pa thams cad la nus pa med par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493a-10: gzhan la kun nas brten nas 'gro bar byed pa; skye bo rnams thams cad bzhad gang du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493a-11: sgra ngar ngar por gyur pa'i dbugs phyir 'byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493a-12: lus kun la bsnye bas nyams par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493a-13: dbang po rnams shin tu rnying par gyur pa thams cad la'ang spro ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493a-14: skye po rnams thams cad skyug zlog par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493b-0: dus shin tu nye @493b bar gyur pa de dag rnams mtsho 'di nyid na rgyu bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493b-1: stobs shin tu'ang chung bar gyur pa gzhan dag gi lag pa la 'phyangs nas gom ba rnams 'bor bar byed pa shin tu'ang 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa rnams yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493b-2: de dang de ltar rgyu bar byed pa rnams kyis lus rnams la dus gzhan 'ga' zhig gi tshe na gzugs mang po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i nad rnams kun tu skye ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493b-4: ha cang thal ches par 'khru ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493b-9: mdze sngon du 'gro bar gyur pa rnams kyi shin tu mi bzad par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493b-10: nye bar 'tshe ba rnams dang bcas pa 'tshi ba'i mthar thug par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493b-11: shin tu skyug bro bar gyur pa'i nad khyad par du drag po de dag rnams kun tu 'byung bar gyur pa'i stobs kyis gso dpyad med pa dang mi 'dod pa rnams mthar thug par byas pas rgyal po de dag rnams thams cad nyid khrid par gyur nas shin tu sdug bsngal ba kho nar 'chi bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:493b-12: shi ba de dag rnams kyi lus de dag rnams zags shing dri mi zhim par gyur pa la srin bu brgya stong gis khyab par gyur pas za bar byed bzhin pa'i lus de dag rnams rang bzhin pa'i lha de dag rnams kyis mthong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494a-0: de nas gang dag gis de dag gi lus @494a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494a-1: rnams 'dzin par byed pa'i sprul pa'i bya rnams kyang kun tu 'ongs par gyur nas kha cig gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494a-4: bzung bar gyur pa mthong nas 'bros par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494a-5: de dag rnams kyang mchog tu skyo ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas su legs par mthong bas lha rang bzhin pa de dag rnams shin tu legs par mnyam par bzhag pa'i yid du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494a-6: gzhan yang lha de dag rnams nyid la phan par bya ba'i don du 'thab bral gyi bdag po brtan pas mgo drangs pa'i lha ma yin gyi rgyal bo gang yin pa de dag rnams sgra gcan 'dzin gyi mthar thug par gyur pa'i sa 'og na gnas pa de dag rnams gang gi tshe mu su lundha las mi ring ba na kun nas gnas par gyur la de'i tshe rnam par khros par gyur pas kyang thams cad kyi skad chen po kun tu gtong zhing phan tshun du'ang bos par gyur nas sa gzhi la kun nas 'gyel ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494a-7: sta res shing ka rtsi k'a ra rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du sa gzhi la 'gyel bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494a-8: 'gyel nas kyang shi bar gyur pas thams cad shing dang rdo ba rnams bzhin du rnam par 'gyur ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494b-0: de dag rnams mngon par mthong nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo de dag rnams @494b shin tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir nas kyang rnam par khro bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494b-2: yongs su bskor bar gyur nas de dag rnams thams cad kyang de ltar ngu bar byed pa rnams la bya dag kun tu 'ongs par gyur nas de dag gis de dag rnams kyi lus shing skam dang rdo ba dang shing bu dang mtshungs par byed pa med pa rnams kun nas 'dren par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494b-3: snying rje rnam par 'khrugs par gyur pa'i lha ma yin gyi bu mo de dag rnams de nas de ltar rnam par 'khrugs pa'i gting thogs nyid la de dag rnams thams cad kyang shi par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494b-4: de dag rnams kyi ro de dag rnams kyang bya rnams nyid kyis 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494b-5: bzung bar gyur nas kyang khva ta dang 'ug pa dang bya rgod rnams nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494b-6: mthong ba'i yul las 'das nas 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494b-7: de ltar yang 'thab bral ba rnams kyi bdag po des rang bzhin gyi lha rnams la phan par bya ba'i don du sprul pa gzhan rnams kyang phul du phyin par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:494b-8: de'i rjes thogs la sprul pa gzhan dag byed pa rnams la ji ltar gang de klu'i rgyal po rnams gang yin pa de dag gi sprul pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495a-0: yang de dag rnams kyi mi rtag pa 'di dag ston par byed pa las de ltar yang klu rnams @495a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495a-2: bye tshan dag gis sreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495a-3: sol ba'i me tsha ba rnams kun tu 'bab par 'gyur zhing de dag rnams bab par gyur pas kyang de ltar sreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495a-4: ji ltar seng ldeng gi me shin tu chen po rnams su rtsva 'jag skam po gcig lhung ba sreg par byed pa de bzhin du lhung bar gyur pa tsam nyid na klu de dag rnams bye tshan gyis sreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495a-5: de dag rnams las gzhan pa'i klu rnams kyang 'chi bdag gis 'khrid par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495a-6: lhan cig spyod par byed pa rnams kyi nang na gnas pa las rnam par khros par gyur bzhin du de dag rnams dus kyi 'khor los sdud par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495a-8: phan tshun du 'gyed par gyur pas phan tshun du bcings nas snying phan tshun du 'joms par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495a-9: de ltar 'chi bdag rnams kyis kun tu khrid par gyur pa'i sprul pa'i klu de dag rnams kyang rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis mthong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495a-10: mthong nas kyang phyir zhing kho na shin tu nges par yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495a-11: gzhan yang 'thab bral ba rnams kyi bdag po de nyid kyis sprul pa gzhan dag byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495a-12: ji ltar shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495b-0: ba lang spyod pa rnams kyi mi rnams kyang rgas pa rnam pa @495b sna tshogs pa rnams kyis zil gyis gnon par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495b-1: lhan cig rjes su spyod pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la na brgya dang stong du'ang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495b-2: shi ba de dag rnams nyid kyi lus de dag rnams la srin bu rnams kyis gang bar gyur par shin tu 'jigs su rung bar sa gzhi la 'gyel bar gyur pa dag rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis mtho par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495b-3: rnam pa du ma dang rnam par rtog pa du mar yang srid pa'i skyon phul du phyin pa'i sdug bsngal gyis 'chi ba mngon par mthong nas rang bzhin gyi lha de dag mchog tu yid byung ba dang ldan par gyur nas 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495b-4: nges par bslang ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495b-5: de ltar yang srog chags su gyur pa gang yin pa 'di dag rnams thams cad kyang rga ba dang nad dang 'chi ba rnams kyis mthar thug par byed pa yin pa rab tu mi shes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495b-6: de dag rnams kyang gang du song gang gis khrid par gyur pa yin; phun sum tshogs pa rnams thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495b-7: mi rtag pa yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495b-8: bde ba rnams thams cad kyang srid pa'i skyon dang kun tu 'dres pa'i 'dus byas zhes bya ba g-yo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:495b-9: mthar 'jig par 'gyur ba 'di la blo dang ldan pa'i skyes bu rnams kyis yid ches par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496a-0: rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can 'di dag @496a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496a-2: srid pa gzhan du'ang bde ba yod pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496a-3: mchog tu skyo ba skyes pa'i yid dang ldan pa'i legs par skyo ba skyes pa'i blo dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams de ltar phan tshun du rjod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496a-4: de nas 'thab bral gyi bdag po des de dag rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba de dag rig par gyur nas sprul pa gzhan yang byed par gyur pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496a-5: de nas skyes bu gang dag nga med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496a-6: nga yi ba med par gyur pa; nges par gong du 'gro ba de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496a-8: gang byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa gang yin pa rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496a-10: lha rnams kyi drung na cung zad pa zhig gis chung ba'i mchog tu skyid par gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496a-11: de dag rnams kyang rgas pa dang nad kyis gzir ba'i bar gyur nas 'chi bdag gi zhags pas 'dren par byed do; ;shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i lus rnams la srin bu brgya stong gis kun nas g-yogs par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496a-12: lus po 'di dag la skye bo rnams thams cad kyis blta bar rjes su mi mthun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496a-13: bshang ba'i phung po rnams kyis kun tu gang bar gyur pa'i byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa 'di dag rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496b-0: de ltar bde ba rgya chen po'i sa @496b na gnas pa'i 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams la phan par bya ba'i don du lha dang mi dang lha ma yin rnams kyi mi rtag pa nyid 'thab bral gyi bdag po 'dis bstan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496b-1: de'i rjes thogs la gang dag rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis mthong bar sprul pa gzhan dag rnams byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496b-3: srid pa bar mdo ba'i tshogs rnam pa du ma rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496b-4: ji ltar shi bar gyur nas sems can rnams las sna tshogs pa rnams kyi dbang gis dmyal ba dang yi dvags dang dud 'gro dang lha dang mi rnams su skye ba de bzhin du srid pa bar mdo pa rnams sprul ba byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496b-5: ji ltar 'gro ba lnga po rnams kun tu rgyu bar byed pa rnams lhar nga bzhin pas mngon sum nyid du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496b-6: de la las du ma rnams las sems kyi tha ma'i bsam pa'i dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496b-7: de las rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams nyid nges par skyo bar bya ba'i don du rnam pa du mar lan brgya stong du skye rgu rnams 'gro bar lngar skye ba sprul par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:496b-8: mtsho de nyid du bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu ngo mtshar ba gzhan rnams dang mi 'dra ba de dag rnams mngon par mthong zhing rang bzhin gyi lha de dag gis mngon sum kho nar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497a-0: de la'ang 'gro ba lngar kun tu rgyu bar byed pa'i 'byung po rnams thams cad las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyi dbang gis @497a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497a-1: 'grangs par gyur pas 'gro ba gzhan nas 'gro ba gzhan rnams su dmyal ba dang yi dvags dang dud 'gro dang lha dang mi'i 'gro ba rnams la yongs su 'khyams par gyur pa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497a-2: skyabs med pa dang grogs med par gyur pas srid pa gzhan rnams brje ba sor byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497a-3: dmyal ba dang yi dvags dang dud 'gro dang lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du brje bsor byed pa rnams mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497a-4: de la srid pa bar ma do ba rnams kyi ya mtshan che bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497a-6: kun nas shin tu 'jigs par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497a-7: mchog tu skyo ba skye bar byed pa thams cad la rab tu 'jigs par byed par gyur pa de dag rnams rang bzhin gyi lha rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497a-8: de la lha rnams nyid kyi de lta bu'i srid pa bar mdo ba mthong ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497a-9: 'thab bral ba'i lha'i rigs rnams las las zad par gyur nas rab tu lhung bar gyur pa na 'gyod pa'i mes sreg par byed pa bag med pa rnams kyis de ltar shin tu bslus nas mgo bo thur la dpyangs pas rab tu lhung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497a-10: de dag 'chi 'pho bar gyur pa na lha gang yin pa'i rgyud des yongs su bzung ba'i phung po de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497b-0: rgya'i rjes dang cha 'dra bar srid pa bar @497b ma do ba de'i 'gro ba rnams kyi phung po rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497b-1: dmyal ba rnams kyi las byas bar gyur pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497b-2: 'khor bas byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa kun nas slong ba'i 'jigs pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497b-3: gzer zug chen por yang gyur pa rnams mngon par mthong nas 'thab bral gyi rang bzhin pa de dag rnams mchog tu skyo ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497b-4: de ltar dmyal ba pa rnams kyi srid pa bar mdo ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497b-6: skye ba'i srid pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497b-7: mu su lundha 'dis legs par ston par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497b-8: rgyu gang gi phyir na lha de dag rnams kyis bzod par mi nus pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497b-9: sems shin tu 'jam pa yin pas skad cig nyid la dus byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497b-10: lha de dag gis dpe med pa'i sdug bsngal 'di rnams mngon par mthong bar byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497b-11: rgyu 'di dag gis sprul pa byas pas 'thab bral gyi bdag po de legs par ston par byed do; ;de ltar lha de dag rnams dmyal bar rab tu lhung bar gyur ba lha gzhan rang bzhin pa de dag rnams kyis rnam par lta bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:497b-12: gzhan yang mu su lundha des ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i sprul pa 'di dag rnams byas pas srid pa bar ma do pa rnams ston par byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498a-0: ji ltar bag med pa gang kho na'i skyon gyis nye bar bcom pa'i 'thab @498a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498a-1: bral gyi rnams las zad nas 'chi 'pho ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498a-3: de dag gi srid pa bar ma de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498a-4: las byas pa de dag dang 'dra ba'i gzugs brnyan du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498a-5: las kyi thag pa ring po rnams kyis drangs par gyur pas mgo thur du dbyangs nas lhung bar 'gyur bas gang la des byas pa'i las kyis 'tshed par byed pa de la de dag kun nas 'khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498a-6: rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis de ltar srid pa bar ma do ba gnyis pa rnams mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498a-7: gzhan yang sprul pa pa'i srid pa bar mdo pa gsum pa rnams mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498a-8: ji lta ba kho nar 'thab bral ba rnams gzhan yang las zad pa nyid bag med pas nye bar bcom nas mgo thur du bltas shing rab tu lhung bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498a-9: shin tu nyams nyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498a-10: kun nas bcings bas kyang dud 'gro rnams su skye'o; ;de dag gi srid pa bar ma do pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498a-11: de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgya'i rjes dang cha 'dra ba'i nyid du skye bar gyur pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498a-12: dud 'gro rnams kyi rnam pa mtha' yas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498a-13: rnam pa du mar gyur pa de dag rnams dang 'dra ba'i srid pa bar ma do pa rnams su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-0: rgya'i rjes dang cha 'dra bar gyur pa de'ang 'gro ba gsum pa rnams @498b gyis kun nas bsdus pa'i srid pa bar ma do pa shin tu skrag par byed pa de dag rnams mngon par mthong nas slar yang lha de dag rnams ches phal che bar skyo bar gyur cing mchog tu kun nas skrag par gyur pas nye 'khor kun na 'jigs pa des khong dngangs par gyur pa'i bzhin gyis phan tshun rnams su mngon par mthong nas tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa ji ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-1: rnam par shes dka' shin tu phra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-2: thams cad du ni rgyug pa po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-3: sems can las kyi dbang 'gro ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-4: thams cad du ni yongs su rgyug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-6: gang yang las 'bras la sdang ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-7: de dag shi nas dmyal bar 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-8: gang yang log par 'dul ba po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-9: gang zhig nang du sdig sbas nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-10: gang yang chos gzhan gyis bslu ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-11: shin tu sdig can 'jig rten de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-12: dmyal ba'i rtse mo'i skal ldan yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-13: bde ba kun chags gzhan gang dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-14: skye bo rtag tu sdig dga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-15: rang gi sems kyis bslus nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-16: de ni bde nas sdug bsngal 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-17: gang zhig mthar thug bder mthong ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-18: bde de mtshon char brjod pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-19: gang yang sdug bsngal rnam smin 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-20: bde de sdug bsngal kho na nyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-21: bag med pa yi lha rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:498b-23: de phyir chos srog gang gi phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-2: khang bu skyed mos tshal dga' zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-3: ched cher bud med rnams la lta //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-4: 'dod pa'i yul gyis ngoms med par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-5: lha ni sa la ltung ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-6: ji ltar bde ba 'phel pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-7: skom pa 'phel ba de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-8: skom pa las ni mchog tu ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-9: mkhas pa las ni rab tu brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-11: mchog tu skyo ba mi skye ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-12: de la bde legs skyabs gang yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-13: gang yang skyob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-14: de ltar rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyis rnam pa du ma'i srid pa bar ma do ba de dag rnams mngon par mthong bar gyur pa dang rab tu skyo ba'i yid kun tu skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-15: de dag rnams kyi sems de dag mngon par mthong nas 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag mu su lundha des sprul pa'i lha de dag rnams thams cad kyis snang bar byas nas legs par phrad par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-16: zhi ba rgyas pa'i cha byad de mngon par mthong nas lha de dag rnams dbugs phyin cing yid phebs par gyur nas 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag mgon po de gang na yod pa der yongs su bskor nas kun tu gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499a-17: gus ba legs par skyes pas khyab par tshim pa'i yid kyis thams cad nyid de na gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499b-0: skyo ba'i yid kyis bdag nyid mgon dang bcas pa de bzhin du de dag rnams kyis @499b rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499b-1: de la rnam pa du ma dang rnam par rtog pa du mar mthong na ngo mtshar bar gyur pa rnams rang gis mthong bas tshim pa med pa'i yid kyis kun dga' ba mthong ba lta bur gyur pa de yongs su bskor nas rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499b-2: de nas 'thab bral gyi bdag po des lha de dag rnams 'di skad ces brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499b-3: khyed cag rnams nags dang nye ba'i nags dang padma'i rdzing bu dang rin po che'i khams rnams dang ldan pas rnam par brgyan pa'i ri'i rtse mo rnams nyid la'ang gar gyis shig ces nyams su blang bar bya ba'i don du rjod par byed kyang ci'ang lha de dag rnams skyo bar gyur pa'i yid legs par skyes pa'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499b-4: bag med pa rnams bsnyung bar bya ba'i yid can rnams byed pa yin nam; de nas rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams kyi 'thab bral gyi bdag po'i drung nas tshig de dag thos nas rang bzhin gyi lha de dag sems rab tu skyo bar gyur pas 'di skad ces brjod de; lha lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499b-7: rin po che'i khams dang ldan pas brgyan pa rnams la bdag cag ji ltar ci'i phyir dga' bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:499b-8: lha rnams mtshor bying ba bzhin du bdag gis 'khor ba'i brel tog rnams rnam par rtog pa du mas kyang bsran par mi tshugs pa rnams rang gi mig sngar mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500a-1: pa; sdug bsngal gyi mthar gtugs par byed pa bdag cag rnams rtag ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500a-4: de dag rnams la snying po cung zad kyang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500a-5: de nas 'thab bral gyi bdag po des lha de dag rnams kyi drung nas tshig gi cha 'di dag rnams thos nas 'di skad ces brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bar 'di dag rnams thams cad sdug bsngal gyi mthar thug pa yin par gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500a-7: de nas lha de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500a-8: bdag cag rnams thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500a-9: ji lta ba bzhin du de la yid song ba lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500a-10: ji ltar shin tu sdug bsngal ba rnams lha'i zhal snga nas shes par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500a-11: de nas de dag gi drung nas 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag des tshig de dag rnams thos nas 'di skad ces brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500a-12: ji ltar 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa de dag rnams ngas brjod par nus mod kyis kyang re zhig ngas khyed rnams la phyogs gcig tsam mngon par brjod par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500a-13: 'khor ba rnams su ji lta bar bag med pa'i dbang gis 'gro bar ma gyur na ni; bskal pa bya ba stong phrag du ma rnams na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500a-14: kye ma dka' slas kyis bde 'gro'i 'gro bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500a-15: 'gro ba gnyis po lha dang mi dag rnyed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-0: shin tu @500b tu dka' ba yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-1: gang dag bag med pa'i dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-3: rkyen gyi dbang gis byung ba rnams kyang yongs su spong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-4: de dag gi dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-5: dmyal ba dang yi dvags dang byol song rnams su de dag skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-6: de la kye ho lha rnams 'gro ba gsum po rnams ngan song zhes mngon par brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-7: lta dang mi'i 'gro ba gnyis po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-8: bde 'gro zhes mngon par brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-9: de dag rnams nyid re zhig ji ltar rab tu stobs che bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal dag mngon par brjod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-11: ston pas mngon par brjod par spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-12: mdor bsdu bar gyur na lha dang mi rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-14: yang lha dang mi rnams kyi de'ang bdag yin na; bde 'gro'i 'gro bas sdus pa'i sdug bsngal du gyur pa rnams la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-15: srid ba bar ma do'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-16: mngal na gnas pa'i yang ba'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-17: mngal nas kun tu 'byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-20: mi mthun pa rnams dang kun tu phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-21: sdug pa rnams dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-22: grang ba dang tsha ba la sogs pas bcings pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:500b-24: gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-2: sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'dre bar byed pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-3: bu dang bu mo dang gnyen 'dun rnams gyi brel dog gi sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-4: bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-5: dbang chung ba'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-7: lhag par gyur pa'i sdug bsngal shin tu sdug bsngal bas shin tu sdug bsngal ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-9: ji ltar rab tu stobs che ba'i sdug bsngal chen po bcu drug po de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-10: mi'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-11: 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa rnams mi'i 'jig rten du skyes pa rnams kyi yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-12: gang sems can gzhan dag rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-13: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan dag rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-14: shin tu'ang bsran par mi bzod pa rnams yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-15: gang yang mthar thug pa kho nar zad par mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-16: rab tu 'jig par mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi bde ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-17: 'di dang srid pa gzhan rnams na'ang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501a-18: de la re zhig drang po kho nar srid pa bar ma dor skyes pa'i dri za srid pa bar ma do pa'i tha snyad can rnams kyi rnam pa ji lta bu'i sdug bsngal yin na 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501b-0: las kyi rlung gis btab par gyur pa rnams sha'i mig gis mngon sum du blta bar byar med par lha'i mig gis @501b mthong bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501b-1: thogs pa med par gyur pa'i rang bzhin can de'ang gang gi tshe mir skye bar 'gyur ba yin pa de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rnam par 'di skye bar 'gyur ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501b-2: rnams pa ji lta bu'i khyim du 'di skye bar 'gyur ba rnams kyang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501b-3: dman pa dang bar ma dang khyad par du 'phags pa'i khyim rnams su sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang shes rab kyi 'bras bu can rnams la skye bar 'gyur ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501b-4: dri za de'ang rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501b-5: srid pa bar ma do pa 'di'i zas kyi rigs su gyur pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501b-6: gal te dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye bar 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501b-7: de'i zas rnams hrud hrud po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501b-12: tshad rnams kyang dman par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501b-13: sbyin pa'i mthu chung bar gyur pa'i phyir na skye ba na'ang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501b-15: mir skye bar gyur pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi dang po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501b-16: de nas skyes par gyur nas las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis mngal na gnas par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501b-17: dbul po'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur na ma'i zas ngan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:501b-20: zas chung par gyur na 'ang sha ma la rab tu brten pas lte ba'i spubs nas rab tu spel bar byed pa'i srog chags mngal na gnas pa kha dog ngan pa dang lus rid par 'gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502a-1: gyur pa'i skyon gyis shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pas gsus pa'i gseb na rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502a-2: zas su gyur pa grang ba dang dro ba dag gis byas pas kyang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502a-3: de ltar gzir bar byed pa mnar ba'i mchog tu phyin pa la 'ang go skabs ye med pa skabs med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502a-4: rnam par khro bar byed na'ang spungs med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502a-5: gcin dang rtug pa'i phung po chen po'i nang du bying bar gyur pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal chen po rnam pa du ma rnams yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502a-8: bde 'gro ba rnams kyang de 'dra na dmyal ba dang yi dvags dang dud 'gro rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502a-9: gzhan yang sdug bsngal gsum pa yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502a-10: de'i rjes thogs la gal te mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba na ma'i skye gnas kyi bug pa'i zor ma mig nas gzir bar gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502a-11: ji ltar bu ram gyi shing 'khrul dmig gis bu gu nas 'byung ba na btsir bar gyur pas 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mngal gyi de yang ma'i skye gnas kyi bu ga nas kun tu 'byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502a-15: de dag gi rjes thogs la sdug bsngal bzhi pa yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502b-0: mar gsar pa dang chu shing gi lo ma ltar shin tu 'jam par gyur pa'i lus rab tu smin pa gzhon sha can gyi dper gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa rnams gang @502b ge tshe btsas pa na ma mas rtsub pa dang rod rod por dang rdol pa dang mdog ngan pa dang las su mi rung ba dang ring ba dang bar mig can 'thug pa dang rtse mo dang sgra mi snyan pa dag gi lag pa gnyis kyis len par byed pa de'i tshe ji ltar mes sreg par byed pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502b-1: ral gris gtub par byed pa de bzhin du shin tu 'jam pa'i phyir na 'di la'ang zug gzer skyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502b-2: de'i lus shin tu 'jam por gyur pa 'di gal te dang por gos 'jam po rnams bskon par gyur kyang de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502b-3: ji ltar bslangs pa dang 'thug pa dang rtsub pa dang rdol ba dang rab tu rnying pa dang btsems pa dang bskums pa rnams kyi nang du lus bcug pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502b-4: grang ba'i dus su 'di'ang shin tu grang bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502b-5: btsas pa na khyim gang yin par ni; grang bas shin tu yang nyen par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502b-6: de bzhin du tshad pa'i dus su tshad pa shin tu stobs che bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502b-7: gang gis shin tu sreg par byed pa'i sbyin pa dman pa nyid kyi phyir na mnar bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502b-8: nang du'ang bsregs nas sdug bsngal gyis ma'i skye gnas nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502b-9: 'di'i sbyin pa dman pa yin pa'i phyir na de'i rjes thogs la zas kyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502b-10: nu ma dag gi dang zas za bar byed pa na'ang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:502b-11: re zhig nu ma dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503a-0: ma zas nyung bar gyur pas de'i nu zho rnams @503a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503a-2: gang gis shin tu rid pa dang mdog nyams pa dang mdog ngan pa dang rdzud par gyur pa dang rgyus pa dang rus pa dang pags pa rnams kyi lhag ma tsam du gyur pa'i lus bkres par gyur pa nad rnams 'dren par byed pa'i lus su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503a-3: de nas dus gzhan na zas dang skom bag tsam yod par gyur na'ang de de kho na bzhin du yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'i rnam par rtog pas yongs su bcom pa'i phyir dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams chung zhing dman pa dang gzhan rnams kyi zas kyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503a-4: gal te shed na srog kun nas gtong ba'am shin tu ring pas 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503a-5: de ltar yin pas yang gal te na nu ma zas su za bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503a-6: ji ltar bar mdzes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503a-7: lus ltad mor che bas srog 'dzin par byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503a-8: de ltar 'di'i sbyin pa ngan pa yin pa'i phyir na 'di'i ma lus pa kun yang rab tu zad par 'gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503a-9: des na yang zas bsod par 'gyur ba rnams kyis 'di'i gsus pa legs par tshim par gyur pa yin na'ang de ltar na'ang zas kyis byas pa'i sdug bsngal chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503a-10: de'i rjes thogs la 'di'i sdug bsngal lnga pa yod pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-0: de de ltar zas kyis byas pa'i sdug bsngal rnams @503b kyis gzir bar gyur pa na 'di la rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams su rgyu bar bya ba'i 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-1: lto bkres pas nye bar bcom pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-2: de des gzir bar gyur pa'i phyir gal te na rku bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-3: gal te na phan pa ma yin pa'i las gzhan cung zad tsam yang byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-4: lhan cig tu gnas pa de gsod par byed pas 'chi ba'am 'chi ba la thug pa'i sdug bsngal lhag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-5: sdug bsngal 'di dag rnams thams cad kyi rang rtse mor phyin par sdug bsngal ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-7: bkres pa dang skom pas byas pa'i sdug bsngal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-8: de la dus de'i tshe na mu su lundha des 'thab bral ba de dag rnams la tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa ji ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-9: phal cher 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-10: bkres pa'i sdug dang mtshungs med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-11: gang gis sems can 'di dag gzir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-12: mi dge'i bdag nyid byas pa las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-13: rang gi lus las langs pa'i me //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-14: bkres pa zhes ni mngon par brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-15: rnam rtog mes ni ljon shing bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-16: 'jig rten gsum gyi lag ma sreg /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-19: bskal pa brgya yi bar du yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-20: 'chi bar gyur pa mthong ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:503b-21: gang yang byis rnams mi dge byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-2: de ni zas rnams dag gi ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-3: gzhi las yin par mkhas rnams brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-4: ltogs pa'i 'bras bu ji bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-5: mi ni rang don la brtson yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-6: khams gsum ma lus 'di dag rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-7: zas kyi dbang gis 'jug pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-8: de dag gang phyir rnam sna tshogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-10: srid gsum chu po de thams cad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-11: zas don gnyer ba byed las yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-12: de ltar mu su lundha des rang bzhin gyi lha de dag rnams la rjod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-13: gzhan yang lha dag mi'i 'jig rten du mi rnams kyi sdug bsngal gang dag zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-15: mi sdug pa dang phrad pa zhes bya ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-16: de la drug po 'di dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-17: mi sdug pa dang kun tu phrad pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-18: de la de dag rnams kyang gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-20: mig gis gzugs rnams gang dag mthong ba nas mdza' bo ma yin pa la sogs pa de dag rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-22: sdug ba ma yin pa rnams mthong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-23: gzugs 'di mthong bar gyur pa las kyang yid kyi rjes su mi mthun zhing dang ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-24: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams rnyog pa can du byas pa las kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504a-25: nye bar 'tsho ba dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal rnams sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la skye bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504b-0: de la gzugs kyi tshogs de dag @504b rnams kun la dang por 'di 'jug par 'gyur ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504b-3: sdig pa'i grogs po'i skyes bu dang phrad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504b-4: de bzhin du rna bas kyang sgra rnams thos pa na mi phan pa dang mi sdug pa dang yid du mi 'ong zhing rjes su mi mthun pa rnams 'di la skye bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504b-5: yid kyi rgyun kyang rnyog pa can du byed pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504b-6: mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504b-7: de la mi mthun pa'i sgra rnams kyi phul du phyin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504b-9: 'di ltar dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sgrog ba na'ang de nyan par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504b-10: 'di thos nas lus zhig pa na'ang ngan song log par ltung ba dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504b-11: gang yang gzhan cung zad sgra mi snyan pa dang mi sdug pa dang mi mthun pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa can rnams gang dag thos nas 'di dag rnams kyi yid mi bde ba skyed par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504b-12: sems kyi rgyud kyang rnyog pa can du byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504b-13: mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504b-14: mi'i 'jig rten pa'i mi rnams kyi mi sdug pa dang phrad pa las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:504b-15: lha dag gang mi rnams kyi mi'i 'jig rten du mi mthun pa dang phrad pa las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal gsum pa gzhan gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-0: snas ji srid du dri rnams snom par byed pa na mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yid du mi @505a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-2: gang yang 'dis mnams par gyur pas sems kyi rgyud rnyog pa can du skyed par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-3: yang yid kyi rjes su mi mthun par gyur pa gang gis 'di kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sdug bsngal rnams skyed par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-6: mi rnams kyi mi'i 'jig rten na mi sdug pa dang phrad pa rnams kyi phul du phyin pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-7: dge legs su gyur pa'i skyes bu gzhan dag gang yang rung ba rnams kyis chos la mchod par bya ba'i rgyu mtshan du'am dge 'dun la'ang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-8: bdug spos phul bar gyur pa las blo gros dman par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-9: yid rmongs rtul bar gyur pa gang dag gis ji ltar 'gro bar gyur pa na'am 'dug par gyur pa na'ang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-10: 'dun pa'i 'dod chags sngon du 'gro bas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-11: mngon par gtse ba sngon du 'gro bas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-12: gus pa med pa sngon du btang bas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-13: thul 'og tu 'jug pa sngon du btang bas kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-14: kun nas chags pa sna phyogs su btang bas de'ang snom par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-15: de'i rgyu las lus zhig par gyur nas ngan song log par ltung bar dmyal bar skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-16: skyes bu ngan pa rnams sna'i rgyu dang sna dang kun tu 'brel ba las mi dge ba'i blo dang ldan pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505a-17: lus zhig par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505b-0: ngan song log par @505b ltung ba dmyal ba rnams su skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505b-3: mi rnams kyi mi'i 'jig rten na mi sdug pa rnams dang phrad pa las kun tu skyes pa'i sdug bsngal zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505b-4: gzhan yang mi sdug pa dang phrad pa las skyes pa'i shin tu sdug bsngal ba rnams yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505b-6: 'di lta ste mi rnams kyi mi'i 'jig rten na blo gros ngan pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu ngan pa rnams ro'i don du nyes pa byed pa'i las rnams byed pa rnams yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505b-7: gang dag gi rgyus lus zhig pa na ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams la skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505b-8: gang yang dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong gi cha byad 'dzin pa nang rul bar gyur pa thos pa dang mi ldan pa dung gi sgra dang mtshungs par spyod pa rnams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505b-9: dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs par gyur pa'am sbyin bdag gi khyim du song bar gyur pa na'ang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505b-10: lce dang rab tu 'brel ba dang de la song ba'i blos dge slong gi cha byad 'dzin pas ro dag myang par byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505b-11: rgyu de dang rkyen de dag gis lus zhig pa nas ngan song log par ltung ba dmyal ba rnams su skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505b-12: gang yang le lo can gyi dge slong gzhan rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:505b-13: bsam gtan gyis bsam gtan du byed pa'i bya ba yongs su btang nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-0: yid de la song ba dang rang gi 'dun pa'i 'dod chags sngon du 'gro bas zas kyi don du gnas na gnas rnams su nye @506a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-2: rgyu de las le lo can de lus zhig pa na ngan song log par ltung ba dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-3: kye ye'i lha dag de la 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-4: 'jig rten du mi rnams la lce ro dang kun tu 'brel ba'i mi sdug pa dang phrad pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-6: mi rnams phan pa 'dod pas byas pa'i mi'i 'jig rten du mi sdug pa dang phrad pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-8: lus kyis reg bya la reg par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-9: de dang rab tu 'brel ba'i blor gyur pa dge ba rnams sems par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-10: chos kyi lam du nges par 'jug par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-11: blo mnyam par bzhag par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-13: skyes bu ngan pa yul ngan pa dang rab tu 'brel ba'i blo dang ldan pa zhes brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-14: lus zhig par gyur nas ngan song log par ltung ba dmyal ba rnams su skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-17: mi rnams la mi'i 'jig rten du mi sdug pa dang kun nas phrad pa'i sdug bsngal zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-19: gzhan yang mi rnams la mi'i 'jig rten du mi sdug pa dang kun nas phrad pa las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal rnams gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-21: gang 'ga' zhig blo g-yo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-070-001:506a-22: blo rnam par gnas pa med pa dang /
